trans-unit.source: Provides a WPF framework-level set of properties, events, and methods for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements.
trans-unit.target: 為 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 項目提供一組 WPF 架構層級的屬性、事件和方法。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the provided WPF framework-level implementation that is built on the WPF core-level APIs that are defined by <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別代表所提供的 WPF 架構層級實作，此實作建置在由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 所定義的 WPF 核心層級 API 之上。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> is the connecting point between WPF framework-level element classes and the WPF core-level set of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> presentation services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 是 WPF 架構層級項目類別以及的 WPF 核心層級設定之間的連接點<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>展示服務。

trans-unit.source: For more information about these concepts, see [WPF Architecture](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-architecture.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關這些概念的詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 架構](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-architecture.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> extends <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and adds the following capabilities:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 擴充<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>並加入下列功能：

trans-unit.source: **Layout system definition**: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> provides specific WPF framework-level implementations for certain methods that were defined as virtual members in <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: **版面配置系統定義**:<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>提供特定方法中的虛擬成員所定義的特定 WPF 架構層級實作<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: Most notably, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> seals certain WPF core-level layout overrides, and instead provides a WPF framework-level equivalent that derived classes should override instead.
trans-unit.target: 最值得注意的是，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>密封特定 WPF 核心層級配置覆寫，並改為提供 WPF 架構層級對等項目，衍生類別應該改為覆寫。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> seals <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A> but provides <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>標誌<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A>但提供<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>。

trans-unit.source: These changes reflect the fact that at the WPF framework-level there is a full layout system in place that can render any <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這些變更反映在 WPF 架構層級為完整配置系統中沒有可呈現任何位置的事實<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: At the WPF core level, certain members that will structure a general [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] based layout solution are in place, but the actual engine of the layout system is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 在 WPF 核心層級，特定的成員，將結構一般[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]根據的配置方案的位置，但未定義的版面配置系統實際引擎。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Layout](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[配置](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md)。

trans-unit.source: **The logical tree:** The general [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] programming model is often expressed in terms of being a tree of elements.
trans-unit.target: **邏輯樹狀結構：**一般[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]程式設計模型通常表示在樹狀目錄中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Support for expressing the tree of elements as a logical tree, and accompanying support for defining that tree in markup is implemented at the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> level.
trans-unit.target: 表示邏輯樹狀結構的項目樹狀結構和隨附支援針對在標記中定義該樹狀結構在實作支援<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>層級。

trans-unit.source: Note however that <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> deliberately does not define a content model, and leaves that responsibility to derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，不過<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>刻意未定義內容的模型，並會保留該衍生類別的責任。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [WPF 中的樹狀結構](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: **Object lifetime events:** It is often useful to know when an element is initialized (the constructor is called) or when the element is first loaded into a logical tree.
trans-unit.target: **物件存留期的事件：**通常是很有幫助 初始化項目時 （稱為建構函式），或項目時先載入到邏輯樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> defines several events related to object lifetime that provide useful hooks for code-behind operations that involve elements, such as adding more child elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 定義數個事件物件存留期與相關，提供有用的攔截程序牽涉到項目，例如新增更多的子元素的程式碼後置作業。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Object Lifetime Events](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件存留期事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md)。

trans-unit.source: **Support for data binding and dynamic resource references:** The property-level support for data binding and resources is implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty> class and embodied in the property system, but the ability to resolve a member value that is stored as an <xref:System.Windows.Expression> (the programming construct that underlies both data binding and dynamic resources) is implemented by <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: **支援資料繫結和動態資源參考：**屬性層級的支援資料繫結和資源實作由<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>類別和屬性系統，但能夠解析的成員值卻儲存為<xref:System.Windows.Expression>（做為資料繫結和動態資源的程式設計建構） 由實作<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md) and [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)和[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。

trans-unit.source: **Styles:** <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> defines the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **樣式：** <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>定義<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> does not yet define support for templates, or support decorators.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>尚未定義支援範本，或支援裝飾項目。

trans-unit.source: These features are introduced by control classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 這些功能所導入控制項類別例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: **More animation support:** Some animation support was already defined at the WPF core level, but <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> extends this by implementing <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginStoryboard%2A> and related members.
trans-unit.target: **更多的動畫支援：**某些動畫支援已定義在 WPF 核心層級，但<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>延伸實作<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginStoryboard%2A>和相關的成員。

trans-unit.source: As can be seen from the class hierarchy, many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] classes derive from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, either directly or through intermediate base classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 從類別階層架構，可以看出許多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>、 直接或透過中繼基底類別，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>。

trans-unit.source: If you intend to use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> as a base class, you might want to first examine the existing derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>做為基底類別，您可能想要先檢查現有的衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> provides support for a number of basic scenarios, but also lacks a number of features that are desirable for an "element" in the sense of a building block that you use to create [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 將多個基本案例中，提供支援，但也缺少一些功能 」 中的項目 」 的意義的建置組塊，用來建立適合[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For instance, a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> does not define any true content model; <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> as a base class does not define a property that can create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] child elements.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>並未定義任何真實的內容模型。<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>為基底類別不會定義可以建立內容[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]子項目。

trans-unit.source: In particular, you might want to look at <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，您可能想要查看<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rendered height of this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得呈現此項目的高度。

trans-unit.source: The element's height, as a value in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 項目的高度，做為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 內的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: This property is a calculated value based on other height inputs, and the layout system.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是其他高度輸入和版面配置系統為基礎的導出的值。

trans-unit.source: The value is set by the layout system itself, based on an actual rendering pass, and may therefore lag slightly behind the set value of properties such as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> that are the basis of the input change.
trans-unit.target: 值，由配置系統本身，根據實際呈現階段，並可能因此落後稍微設定值的屬性例如<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>所輸入變更的基礎。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is a calculated value, you should be aware that there could be multiple or incremental reported changes to it as a result of various operations by the layout system.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>是計算的值，您應該注意可能有多個，或累加式報告，來變更各種作業的結果由配置系統。

trans-unit.source: The layout system may be calculating required measure space for child elements, constraints by the parent element, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 配置系統可能會計算子項目所需的測量空間、父項目的條件約束，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: Although you cannot set this property from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you can base a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> upon its value in a style.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您無法設定此屬性從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您可以根據<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>樣式中的值。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example displays various height properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示各種高度屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rendered width of this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得呈現此項目的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The element's width, as a value in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 項目的寬度，做為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 內的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: This property is a calculated value based on other width inputs, and the layout system.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是其他寬度輸入和版面配置系統為基礎的導出的值。

trans-unit.source: The value is set by the layout system itself, based on an actual rendering pass, and may therefore lag slightly behind the set value of properties such as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> that are the basis of the input change.
trans-unit.target: 值，由配置系統本身，根據實際呈現階段，並可能因此落後稍微設定值的屬性例如<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>所輸入變更的基礎。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> is a calculated value, you should be aware that there could be multiple or incremental reported changes to it as a result of various operations by the layout system.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>是計算的值，您應該注意可能有多個，或累加式報告，來變更各種作業的結果由配置系統。

trans-unit.source: The layout system may be calculating required measure space for child elements, constraints by the parent element, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 配置系統可能會計算子項目所需的測量空間、父項目的條件約束，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: Although you cannot set this property from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you can base a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> upon its value in a style.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您無法設定此屬性從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您可以根據<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>樣式中的值。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example displays various width properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示各種寬度屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Child element to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的子項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds the provided object to the logical tree of this element.
trans-unit.target: 將所提供的物件加入至此項目的邏輯樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Use this method for the implementation of collections on objects that represent logical child elements of an element.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法的物件，代表項目的邏輯子項目集合的實作。

trans-unit.source: Collection maintenance for child element collections might be done in property getters or setters, class handling of Changed events, constructors, or within the collection types themselves.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 getter 或 setter，處理已變更事件，建構函式，或將集合型別本身內的類別可能透過集合維護的子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: For control authors, manipulating the logical tree at this level is not the recommended practice, unless none of the content models for available base control classes are appropriate for your control scenario.
trans-unit.target: 控制作者的處理邏輯樹狀結構，此層級不是建議的作法，除非可用控制項的基底類別的內容模型都適用於程式控制項案例。

trans-unit.source: Consider subclassing at the level of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮在層級的子類別化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: These classes provide a content model with particular enforcement of logical tree child elements through dedicated [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)], as well as support for other features typically desirable in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] control such as styling through templates.
trans-unit.target: 這些類別提供特定的強制執行的邏輯樹狀結構子項目，透過專用的內容模型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]，以及通常希望出現在其他功能的支援[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]控制項，例如透過範本的樣式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LogicalChildren%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.AddLogicalChild%2A>, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LogicalChildren%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.AddLogicalChild%2A>，請參閱[中 WPF 樹狀架構](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.AddLogicalChild%2A> may throw an exception if called at a time when the logical tree is being iterated by another process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.AddLogicalChild%2A> 如果呼叫時之邏輯樹狀結構正在反覆執行另一個處理序一次，則可能會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a `Child` property on a custom <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that does its own visual layer implementation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會實作`Child`在自訂屬性<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>執行它自己的視覺層實作。

trans-unit.source: The property setter is designed so that if the value changes, the old value is removed from the logical tree, as well as a class-specific visual collection.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 setter 的設計，所以如果值變更時，會從邏輯樹狀結構，以及類別的特定視覺集合移除的舊值。

trans-unit.source: The property value is cached, and then the new value is added to both the logical tree and the custom visual collection.
trans-unit.target: 快取的屬性值時，並再新值加入至邏輯樹狀結構和自訂的視覺集合。

trans-unit.source: Builds the current template's visual tree if necessary, and returns a value that indicates whether the visual tree was rebuilt by this call.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，則建置目前範本的視覺化樹狀，並傳回值，指出此呼叫是否已重建視覺化樹狀。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if visuals were added to the tree; returns <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果已將視覺化效果加入至樹狀結構則傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Applications can call this method to guarantee that the visual tree of an element is complete.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以呼叫這個方法，以保證視覺化樹狀結構項目的已完成。

trans-unit.source: This guarantee step might be necessary if code will be checking the child elements in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 此保證步驟可能需要如果程式碼會檢查樹狀結構中的子項目。

trans-unit.source: For typical element logic within applications, calling <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> is not necessary, because templates will be applied to elements at an appropriate point in their lifetimes automatically.
trans-unit.target: 典型的項目，呼叫應用程式內的邏輯<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>並非必要，因為範本將會在適當的時間點的項目在其存留期自動套用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> is called on every Measure pass by the WPF framework-level layout system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> 每個量值上呼叫傳 WPF 架構層級配置系統。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived classes can use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A> class handler to be notified of cases where this method was called explicitly, or by the layout system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 在衍生的類別可以使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A>的情況下，明確地呼叫這個方法後，或由配置系統通知的類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A> is called after the template is completely generated and attached to the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A> 是範本完全產生，並附加至邏輯樹狀結構後呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 父系內這個項目應該用來排列本身和其子系的最終區域。

trans-unit.source: Implements <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore(System.Windows.Rect)" /> (defined as virtual in <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />) and seals the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore(System.Windows.Rect)" /> (在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 內定義為 Virtual)，並密封實作。

trans-unit.source: This method is sealed.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是密封格式。

trans-unit.source: In order to override the logic in your custom element specifically for the arrange pass of element layout, your <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived class must override <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫項目配置的排列傳遞特別為您自訂項目中的邏輯您<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>衍生的類別必須覆寫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 父系內這個項目應該用來排列本身和其子系的最終區域。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, positions child elements and determines a size for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，為子項目定位，並且判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 所衍生類別的大小。

trans-unit.source: The actual size used.
trans-unit.target: 使用的實際大小。

trans-unit.source: Control authors who want to customize the arrange pass of layout processing should override this method.
trans-unit.target: 控制作者想要自訂版面配置處理的排列傳遞都應該覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern should call <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange(System.Windows.Rect)" /> on each visible child element, and pass the final desired size for each child element as the <paramref name="finalRect" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 實作模式應該呼叫<see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange(System.Windows.Rect)" />上每個可見的子元素，並傳遞最後所需的大小，為每個子項目的<paramref name="finalRect" />參數。

trans-unit.source: Parent elements should call <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange(System.Windows.Rect)" /> on each child, otherwise the child elements will not be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 父項目應該呼叫<see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange(System.Windows.Rect)" />上每個子系，否則子元素將不會轉譯。

trans-unit.source: Many derived classes offer implementations of this method.
trans-unit.target: 許多衍生的類別會提供這個方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: Prominent ones include: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Window.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" />, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Page.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Control.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯著的包括： <see cref="M:System.Windows.Window.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" />，<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Page.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" />和<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Control.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" />。

trans-unit.source: Starts the initialization process for this element.
trans-unit.target: 啟動這個項目的初始化處理序 (Process)。

trans-unit.source: You can call this method on individual elements if you are adjusting them in ways that do not yet expose or connect the element to any element tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在調整它們的方式仍未公開或連線到任何項目樹狀結構項目，您可以在個別的項目上呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For instance, you might have created a new <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, but have not yet attached it to any logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可能已建立新<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，但不是尚未將它附加到任何邏輯樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Or, the logical tree where your element is a child element within it might not be connected to a window or page of the application.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您的項目所在的子元素，在其中之邏輯樹狀結構可能未連線至視窗或應用程式頁面。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to provide special handling that should happen before your element is initialized during the element loading process.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法以提供您的項目初始化期間載入處理序的項目之前應該發生的特殊處理。

trans-unit.source: Your implementation should call the base implementation, because the base (default) implementation sets some internal flags to keep track of initialization.
trans-unit.target: 您的實作應該呼叫基底實作，因為基底 （預設值） 實作設定追蹤的初始設定部分內部旗標。

trans-unit.source: One possible implementation is to use this method as a hook into your own private class initialization routines that are not already enabled by constructors.
trans-unit.target: 一個可能的實作是使用這個方法來攔截到您自己的私用類別初始化常式，尚未啟用的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation will throw an exception if <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit" /> is called more than one time on the same element prior to <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit" /> being called.
trans-unit.target: 基底實作將會擲回例外狀況，如果<see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit" />超過一次上呼叫相同的項目之前<see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit" />所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Begins the sequence of actions contained in the provided storyboard.
trans-unit.target: 開始提供之腳本中包含的動作順序。

trans-unit.source: The storyboard to begin.
trans-unit.target: 要開始的腳本。

trans-unit.source: Begins the sequence of actions that are contained in the provided storyboard.
trans-unit.target: 開始提供之腳本中包含的動作順序。

trans-unit.source: Most typical animation scenarios do not use this method.
trans-unit.target: 最常見的動畫案例不會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> element in markup, and then you place these as the <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> content on an element.
trans-unit.target: 通常您會建立<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>元素標記，然後再將這些做為<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>內容項目上。

trans-unit.source: When triggered by the event, the animation then runs.
trans-unit.target: 事件所觸發，動畫就會執行。

trans-unit.source: Most of the control aspects of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> can be addressed by properties that are exposed in markup.
trans-unit.target: 在控制方面的大部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>可以定址標記中公開的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For the signatures that do not use the `isControllable`, parameter, or when that parameter is specified `false`, the timeline clocks that are associated with the animation are removed as soon as the animation reaches the "Fill" period.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用簽章`isControllable`，參數，或指定該參數時， `false`，一旦動畫到達"填滿 」 期間，會移除相關聯的動畫時間軸時鐘。

trans-unit.source: Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after running once.
trans-unit.target: 因此動畫無法重新啟動之後執行一次。

trans-unit.source: Controlling an animation also requires that the storyboard have an [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md) or be accessible by reference in code.
trans-unit.target: 控制動畫也必須要有分鏡腳本[X:name 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)或可供程式碼中參考。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> from resources, and then runs that <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when an internal event is class handled.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>從 [資源]，然後執行可<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>內部的事件時處理的類別。

trans-unit.source: The storyboard to begin.
trans-unit.target: 要開始的腳本。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration that describes behavior to use if a property described in the storyboard is already animated.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別的值，其描述若腳本中描述的屬性已顯示動畫時，所要使用的行為。

trans-unit.source: Begins the sequence of actions contained in the provided storyboard, with options specified for what should happen if the property is already animated.
trans-unit.target: 使用若屬性已經顯示動畫時應發生之情形的指定選項，開始提供之腳本中包含的動作順序。

trans-unit.source: Most typical animation scenarios do not use this method.
trans-unit.target: 最常見的動畫案例不會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> element in markup, and then you place these as the <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> content on an element.
trans-unit.target: 通常您會建立<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>元素標記，然後再將這些做為<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>內容項目上。

trans-unit.source: When triggered by the event, the animation then runs.
trans-unit.target: 事件所觸發，動畫就會執行。

trans-unit.source: Most of the control aspects of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> can be addressed by properties that are exposed in markup.
trans-unit.target: 在控制方面的大部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>可以定址標記中公開的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For the signatures that do not use the `isControllable`, parameter, or when that parameter is specified `false`, the timeline clocks that are associated with the animation are removed as soon as the animation reaches the "Fill" period.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用簽章`isControllable`，參數，或指定該參數時， `false`，一旦動畫到達"填滿 」 期間，會移除相關聯的動畫時間軸時鐘。

trans-unit.source: Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after running once.
trans-unit.target: 因此動畫無法重新啟動之後執行一次。

trans-unit.source: Controlling an animation also requires that the storyboard have an [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md) or be accessible by reference in code.
trans-unit.target: 控制動畫也必須要有分鏡腳本[X:name 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)或可供程式碼中參考。

trans-unit.source: Handoff behavior can be specified as an attribute of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>.
trans-unit.target: 可以指定遞移式行為的屬性為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>。

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior
trans-unit.target: 使用撰寫 HandoffBehavior

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove the clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: 當您將套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>之前與該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源; 計時系統不會自動移除時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks by using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免發生效能問題，當您藉由套用大量時鐘<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>，在它們完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock:
trans-unit.target: 有數種方式可移除時鐘：

trans-unit.source: To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: 若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>動畫物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: 指定的第一個參數，要繪製之屬性和`null`做為第二個。

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: 這會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除特定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>時鐘的清單，從使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>，然後呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>。

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>時鐘的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>;<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>子時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not raised if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>是否有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 這主要是在存留期較長的物件才會發生的動畫問題。

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷其時鐘和記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> from resources, and then runs that <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when an internal event is class handled.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>從 [資源]，然後執行可<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>內部的事件時處理的類別。

trans-unit.source: The storyboard to begin.
trans-unit.target: 要開始的腳本。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration that describes behavior to use if a property described in the storyboard is already animated.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別的值，其描述若腳本中描述的屬性已顯示動畫時，所要使用的行為。

trans-unit.source: Declares whether the animation is controllable (can be paused) after it is started.
trans-unit.target: 宣告在動畫啟動後，是否可以控制 (暫停) 該動畫。

trans-unit.source: Begins the sequence of actions contained in the provided storyboard, with specified state for control of the animation after it is started.
trans-unit.target: 使用控制啟動後之動畫的指定狀態，開始提供之腳本中包含的動作順序。

trans-unit.source: Most typical animation scenarios do not use this method.
trans-unit.target: 最常見的動畫案例不會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.target: 在控制方面的大部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>可以定址標記中公開的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after running once.
trans-unit.target: 因此動畫無法重新啟動之後執行一次。

trans-unit.target: 控制動畫也必須要有分鏡腳本[X:name 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)或可供程式碼中參考。

trans-unit.target: 可以指定遞移式行為的屬性為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>。

trans-unit.target: 使用撰寫 HandoffBehavior

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove the clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: 當您將套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>之前與該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源; 計時系統不會自動移除時鐘。

trans-unit.target: 若要避免發生效能問題，當您藉由套用大量時鐘<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>，在它們完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。

trans-unit.target: 有數種方式可移除時鐘：

trans-unit.source: To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: 若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>動畫物件的方法。

trans-unit.target: 這會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除特定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>時鐘的清單，從使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>，然後呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>。

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>時鐘的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>;<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>子時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not raised if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>是否有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 這主要是在存留期較長的物件才會發生的動畫問題。

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷其時鐘和記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup" /> that is used for the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup" /> that is used for the element.
trans-unit.target: 用於項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> can be used to validate the values of multiple properties of an object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>可以用來驗證物件的多個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that an application prompts the user to enter an address and then populates an object of type `Address`, which has the properties `Street`, `City`, `ZipCode`, and `Country`, with the values that the user provided.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設應用程式會提示使用者輸入的位址，然後填入型別的物件`Address`，其中具有屬性`Street`， `City`， `ZipCode`，和`Country`，值的使用者提供。

trans-unit.source: The application has a panel that contains four <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> controls, each of which is bound to one of the object’s properties.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式必須包含四個面板<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>控制項，其中每個繫結至其中一個物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> in a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> to validate the `Address` object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>中<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>驗證`Address`物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> can ensure that the zip code is valid for the country of the address.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>可以確保，郵遞區號就是有效的地址的國家/地區。

trans-unit.source: Child elements inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> from their parent elements, just as with any other inheritable property.
trans-unit.target: 子項目會繼承<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>從其父項目，就如同任何其他可繼承的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to **true**
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**

trans-unit.source: The following examples are part of an application that checks whether the user has set the properties of two objects to equal values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是應用程式會檢查使用者是否已設定為相等的值的兩個物件的屬性的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The first example creates two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> controls, each of which is bound to a different data source.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例會建立兩個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>控制項，其中每個繫結至不同的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> has a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> that checks that the two strings are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>具有<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>，以檢查兩個字串是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> that the previous example uses.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>先前範例所使用。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method override, the example gets each source object from the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> and checks whether the properties of the objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>方法覆寫時，此範例會取得每個來源物件的<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>，並檢查之物件的屬性是否相等。

trans-unit.source: To invoke the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A> when the click event of the button occurs.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A>按鈕的 click 事件發生時。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BindingGroup" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BindingGroup" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to bring this element into view, within any scrollable regions it is contained within.
trans-unit.target: 在內含此項目的任何可捲動區域內，嘗試將此項目帶入檢視。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to bring this element into view, within any scrollable regions it is contained within.
trans-unit.target: 在內含此項目的任何可捲動區域內，嘗試將此項目帶入檢視。

trans-unit.source: By calling this method, you raise a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> event that originates from the current element.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫這個方法，您將提高<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>事件來自 目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised so that it can be handled by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, or a derived or similar class.
trans-unit.target: 會引發這個事件，以便可由處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>，或衍生或類似的類別。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that the event is handled by the parent element, marked handled in the event data, and the source of the event is brought into view through the logic embedded in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，父項目，標示為已處理的事件資料，在處理事件和事件的來源資料被引進的邏輯內嵌在透過檢視<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Neither the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> event nor the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A> method transmit any information about success or failure, other than that the event is typically marked handled on success.
trans-unit.target: 既不<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>事件和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A>方法傳輸相關的成功或失敗，而不是，事件通常是標示為成功處理上的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: Reasons for failure can include the element settings, such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> being some value other than <xref:System.Windows.Visibility.Visible>.
trans-unit.target: 問題的原因失敗可以包括項目設定，例如<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A>以外的某個值<xref:System.Windows.Visibility.Visible>。

trans-unit.source: If you use the signature that does not specify a `targetRectangle`, then the entire element size (its <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderSize%2A>) will be made visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用未指定的簽章`targetRectangle`，然後整個項目大小 (其<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderSize%2A>) 將會看見。

trans-unit.source: By calling this method, you potentially will call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.MakeVisible%2A> on any parent scrollable area that contains the element.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫這個方法，您可能會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.MakeVisible%2A>上任何父可捲動區域包含的項目。

trans-unit.source: If this element is not contained in a scrollable area, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> event is still raised, but there will be no effect because there are no event listeners.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目不包含在可捲動區域，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>仍然會引發事件，但沒有作用，因為會不有任何事件接聽程式。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a handler for an application navigation event that responds whenever the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] being navigated to includes a fragment.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會實作應用程式瀏覽事件，每當回應的處理常式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]正要巡覽至包含片段。

trans-unit.source: The fragment is named in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] following the hash sign (#), and the implemented behavior causes the element to scroll into view within the frame.
trans-unit.target: 片段以命名[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]遵循雜湊符號 （#），並實作的行為會導致要捲動到檢視範圍內的項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> request that scrolling behavior in the example.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>要求在範例中的捲動行為。

trans-unit.source: Specified size of the element that should also be brought into view.
trans-unit.target: 指定同樣應帶入檢視的項目大小。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to bring the provided region size of this element into view, within any scrollable regions it is contained within.
trans-unit.target: 在內含此項目的任何可捲動區域內，嘗試將此項目所提供的區域大小帶入檢視。

trans-unit.source: By calling this method, you raise a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> event that originates from the current element.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫這個方法，您將提高<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>事件來自 目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised so that it can be handled by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, or a derived or similar class.
trans-unit.target: 會引發這個事件，以便可由處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>，或衍生或類似的類別。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that the event is handled by the parent element, marked handled in the event data, and the source of the event is brought into view through the logic embedded in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，父項目，標示為已處理的事件資料，在處理事件和事件的來源資料被引進的邏輯內嵌在透過檢視<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Neither the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> event nor the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A> method transmit any information about success or failure, other than that the event is typically marked handled on success.
trans-unit.target: 既不<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>事件和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A>方法傳輸相關的成功或失敗，而不是，事件通常是標示為成功處理上的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: Reasons for failure can include the element settings, such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> being some value other than <xref:System.Windows.Visibility.Visible>.
trans-unit.target: 問題的原因失敗可以包括項目設定，例如<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A>以外的某個值<xref:System.Windows.Visibility.Visible>。

trans-unit.source: If you use the signature that does not specify a `targetRectangle`, then the entire element size (its <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderSize%2A>) will be made visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用未指定的簽章`targetRectangle`，然後整個項目大小 (其<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderSize%2A>) 將會看見。

trans-unit.source: By calling this method, you potentially will call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.MakeVisible%2A> on any parent scrollable area that contains the element.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫這個方法，您可能會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.MakeVisible%2A>上任何父可捲動區域包含的項目。

trans-unit.source: If this element is not contained in a scrollable area, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> event is still raised, but there will be no effect because there are no event listeners.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目不包含在可捲動區域，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>仍然會引發事件，但沒有作用，因為會不有任何事件接聽程式。

trans-unit.source: The following example has a large graphic in a constrained scrolling region.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會在限制的捲動區域中有大型的圖形。

trans-unit.source: A button on the page has a handler that scrolls the view to a particular region of the large graphic.
trans-unit.target: 頁面上的按鈕有捲動檢視來大量圖形的特定區域的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the context menu element that should appear whenever the context menu is requested through [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] from within this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定透過操作功能表項目的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 要求操作功能表時應該出現的操作功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The context menu assigned to this element.
trans-unit.target: 指派給這個項目的操作功能表。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> itself is a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived class, and it is technically possible for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> itself to have a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> 本身是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>衍生類別，而且是可行的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>本身有<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, this creates a confusing context menu experience for the user and this practice is not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這會建立令人混淆的內容功能表經驗的使用者並不建議此做法。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before any context menu on the element is closed.
trans-unit.target: 在項目上的任何內容功能表正要關閉之前發生。

trans-unit.source: To suppress closing context menus, handlers of the event should mark it as handled.
trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏關閉內容功能表的 事件處理常式應將其標記為已處理。

trans-unit.source: To use this event as an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style, you must reference the underlying service's definition of the event:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此事件為<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>在樣式中，您必須參考事件的基礎服務定義：

trans-unit.source: (This usage is required because the event implementation on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that exposes the underlying service event does not map the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuClosing> identifier such that you can use it as a trigger).
trans-unit.target: (這種用法是必要的因為上的事件實作<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，會公開基礎的服務事件不會對應<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuClosing>識別項，您可以使用它的觸發程序)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> itself is a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived class, but the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuClosing> event will not be raised by a context menu directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> 本身是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>衍生的類別，但是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuClosing>事件將不會引發快顯功能表的直接。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the event is raised from the element that "owns" the context menu as a property and is only raised when a user attempts to close a context menu in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，會引發事件，從 「 擁有 」 做為屬性的內容功能表，且只會在使用者嘗試以關閉在 UI 中的內容功能表時所引發的項目。

trans-unit.source: However it is possible for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> itself to have a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A> property (a nested context menu).
trans-unit.target: 但是它可能是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>本身有<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A>屬性 （巢狀的內容功能表）。

trans-unit.source: In this case the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> really does own the nested <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and might raise the event, with the source of the event being the nested context menu.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>實際上並擁有巢狀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>然後可能會引發事件，與正在巢狀的內容功能表上的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> class itself also has a similar event (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed>) but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed> event does not provide you the opportunity to cancel the user action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>類別本身也有類似的事件 (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed>) 但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed>事件不會為您提供取消的使用者動作的機會。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: 反昇

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnContextMenuClosing%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnContextMenuClosing%2A>實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuClosing" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuClosing" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any context menu on the element is opened.
trans-unit.target: 當項目上的任何內容功能表開啟時發生。

trans-unit.source: To manually open context menus, handlers of the events should mark the relevant event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 若要手動開啟內容功能表，為已處理的事件處理常式時，應該標記相關的事件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the existing value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A> property will be used to automatically open a context menu.
trans-unit.target: 否則，現有的值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A>屬性會用來自動開啟內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: Marking the event handled will effectively cancel the default action, and could be an opportunity to reset the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A> property and then open the new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: 標記處理事件會有效地取消的預設動作，並可能會重設的值有機會<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A>屬性，然後開啟 新<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>。

trans-unit.source: However, there is a timing issue you should be aware of.
trans-unit.target: 不過，是您應該注意的時間問題。

trans-unit.source: In order to completely replace the context menu through a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening> handler, the initial context menu must not be null / empty.
trans-unit.target: 為了完全取代透過內容功能表<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening>處理常式中，初始的內容功能表必須不是 null 或空白。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you might need to handle the event and then manually open a new context menu.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可能需要處理事件，並手動開啟新的內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [How to: Handle the ContextMenuOpening Event](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-handle-the-contextmenuopening-event.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 處理 ContextMenuOpening 事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-handle-the-contextmenuopening-event.md)。

trans-unit.source: To use this event as an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style, you must reference the underlying attached event:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此事件為<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>在樣式中，您必須參考基礎附加的事件：

trans-unit.source: (This usage is required because the event implementation on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that exposes the underlying service event does not map the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening> identifier such that you can use it in triggers).
trans-unit.target: (這種用法是必要的因為上的事件實作<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，會公開基礎的服務事件不會對應<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening>識別項，可用於觸發程序)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> itself is a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived class, but this event will not be raised from the context menu being opened as a source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> 本身是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>衍生的類別，但不是會從內容功能表開啟做為來源引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The event is raised from the element that "owns" the context menu as a property and is only raised when a user attempts to open a context menu in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 從 「 擁有 」 做為屬性的內容功能表，且只會在使用者嘗試在 UI 中開啟內容功能表時所引發的項目，會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> itself to have a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A> property, but you should avoid this scenario (for details, see <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: 可能會<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>本身有<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A>屬性，但是您應該避免這種情況 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> class itself also has a similar event (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened>) but <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened> does not provide you the opportunity to cancel the user action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>類別本身也有類似的事件 (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened>) 但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened>不會為您提供取消的使用者動作的機會。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: 反昇

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnContextMenuOpening%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnContextMenuOpening%2A>實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cursor that displays when the mouse pointer is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定滑鼠指標在此元素上方時所顯示的游標。

trans-unit.source: The cursor to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的游標。

trans-unit.source: The default value is defined as <see langword="null" /> per this dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值依這個相依性屬性定義為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: However, the practical default at run time will come from a variety of factors.
trans-unit.target: 不過，執行階段的實際預設值會受各種因素影響。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor relies on type conversion for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> class to evaluate the string.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定此屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器依賴的型別轉換<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>類別來評估的字串。

trans-unit.source: The provided string should evaluate to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorType> value.
trans-unit.target: 提供的字串應評估為<xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorType>值。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> for details.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>。

trans-unit.source: Whether the cursor as established by this property will or will not display when the mouse pointer is over this element is also dependent on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性所建立的資料指標將還是不會顯示當滑鼠指標位在這個項目也是取決於值的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Also, event-related considerations such as an active drag, mouse capture, text editing modes within controls, and so on, will also affect the cursor with higher priority than the value you specify in this property.
trans-unit.target: 此外，事件相關的考量，例如使用中拖曳滑鼠擷取、 文字編輯模式中的控制項，並依此類推，也會影響資料指標具有較高的優先順序比您指定這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: To revert the behavior of setting this property to the eventual default, set it to `null` again.
trans-unit.target: 若要還原的此屬性設定為最終的預設行為，將它設定為`null`一次。

trans-unit.source: The `null` default really means that determination of the practical cursor value is deferred here and should be obtained from elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: `null`預設真的表示實際的資料指標的值判斷此處延後，應該從別處取得。

trans-unit.source: If presented without programmatic values from any source, the default cursor that is visually over a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application will be an arrow.
trans-unit.target: 如果看到不含以程式設計方式從任何來源的值，預設資料指標，是以視覺化方式超過[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]應用程式將會箭號。

trans-unit.source: However, the transient cursor changes are not set to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A> values of the elements when they are passed over.
trans-unit.target: 不過，暫時性游標會變更不會設定為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A>時透過傳送的項目值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A> property will only report non null values in cases where it was actually set, for instance through code or a style.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A>屬性將只報告非 null 值在實際設於何處，例如透過程式碼或樣式的情況下。

trans-unit.source: Each movement of the mouse over a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application raises a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor> event.
trans-unit.target: 每次移動滑鼠停留[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]應用程式引發<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event bubbles, and any element along the route has the opportunity to handle the event and to set the value of the cursor through the arguments of this event.
trans-unit.target: 事件反昇，且此路由上的任何項目都有機會處理事件，並設定資料指標到這個事件的引數的值。

trans-unit.source: This is the mechanism that produces the visually apparent cursor in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 這是會產生在大部分情況下以視覺化方式明顯的資料指標的機制。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor> handler returns a cursor result, then the fact that the event is handled and has a changed value in the arguments takes precedence over the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A> property at any level, unless <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor>處理常式傳回一個資料指標結果，則事件處理，而且引數中已變更的值的優先順序高於值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A>屬性在任何層級，除非<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: If not are not creating a custom cursor, you typically set this property to a static property value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors> class.
trans-unit.target: 您如果不建立自訂游標，通常有設定此屬性的靜態屬性值<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors>類別。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A> in code requires one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A>程式碼中需要下列其中之一：

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> constructor to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> instance.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>建構函式來取得<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Both signatures of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> constructor use streams or files, in anticipation that you are creating the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> object for a custom cursor.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個簽章<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>建構函式使用資料流或檔案，您所建立的頁數<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>自訂的資料指標的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorConverter> class and its <xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method to specify a cursor by <xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorType>, or a string that can evaluate to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorType>, and cast the return to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorConverter>類別和其<xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法，以指定的資料指標<xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorType>，或可以評估為字串<xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorType>，並轉換至傳回<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> to a custom value is not enabled in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>自訂值中未啟用部分信任。

trans-unit.source: For more information on custom cursors, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關自訂的資料指標的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to deliberately set the cursor graphic.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何刻意設定游標圖形。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data context for an element when it participates in data binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目在參與資料繫結時的資料內容。

trans-unit.source: The object to use as data context.
trans-unit.target: 用做為資料內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: *Data context* is a concept that allows elements to inherit information from their parent elements about the data source that is used for binding, as well as other characteristics of the binding, such as the path.
trans-unit.target: *資料內容*是一種概念，可讓項目繼承其父項目，用於繫結，以及其他特性，例如路徑繫結的資料來源的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Data context can be set directly to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, with the bindings evaluating to properties of that object.
trans-unit.target: 資料內容設為直接[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]物件，並將該物件的內容來評估的繫結。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can set the data context to a <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將資料內容設<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property inherits property values.
trans-unit.target: 這個相依性屬性會繼承屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If there are child elements without other values for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> established through local values or styles, then the property system will set the value to be the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有其他值的項目子系<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>透過本機值或樣式，所建立，則對屬性系統將會設定這個值為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>指派此值與最接近的父項目的值。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use one of the following properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> class to specify the binding source explicitly: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用的下列屬性的其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>類別來明確指定繫結來源： <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Specify the Binding Source](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 指定的繫結來源](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md)。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> is most typically set to as a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> declaration.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>大部分都是設為<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>宣告。

trans-unit.source: You can use either property element syntax or attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用屬性項目語法或屬性語法。

trans-unit.source: Attribute syntax is shown in the example on this page.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，此頁面上顯示屬性語法。

trans-unit.source: You can also use code to set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用程式碼來設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> is a bindable property, to facilitate scenarios where one context might be bound to another.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> 是可繫結的屬性，為 dbtype_iunknown 其中一個內容可能繫結至另一個。

trans-unit.source: However, if you bind to <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>, be careful to not create circular binding references (do not bind a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> to itself, which is possible to do because of the property value inheritance nature of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您繫結至<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>，請小心不要建立循環繫結參考 (請不要繫結<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>，這是因為屬性值繼承性質而這麼做<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>屬性)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *dataContextObject*
trans-unit.target: *dataContextObject*

trans-unit.source: A directly embedded object that serves as data context for any bindings within the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 直接內嵌的物件做為父項目中的任何繫結的資料內容。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this object is a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or another <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這個物件是<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>或另一個<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, raw data of any [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object type intended for binding may be placed here, with the actual bindings defined later.
trans-unit.target: 或者，任何未經處理資料[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]物件適用於繫結，可能會放在這裡，以實際的繫結稍後所定義的類型。

trans-unit.source: *bindingUsage*
trans-unit.target: *bindingUsage*

trans-unit.source: A binding usage that evaluates to an appropriate data context.
trans-unit.target: 評估為適當的資料內容繫結使用方式。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Binding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Binding 標記延伸模組](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md)。

trans-unit.source: *resourceExtension*
trans-unit.target: *resourceExtension*

trans-unit.source: One of the following: or .
trans-unit.target: 下列其中之一： 或。

trans-unit.source: This usage is used when referring to raw data defined as an object in resources.
trans-unit.target: 定義為資源中之物件的未經處理資料時，就會使用這種使用方式。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。

trans-unit.source: *contextResourceKey*
trans-unit.target: *contextResourceKey*

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the object being requested from within a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 從所要求之物件的金鑰識別碼<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how a data context acts on a binding and provides the information that defines the specific values of bound properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將說明資料內容繫結上的作用，並提供所定義的繫結屬性的特定值的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the data context for this element changes.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目的資料內容變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of data contexts and data binding, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需資料內容和資料繫結的說明，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> for an element changes, all data-bound properties on this element are potentially affected.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>潛在影響的項目變更時，這個項目上的所有資料繫結屬性。

trans-unit.source: This applies to any elements that are child elements of the current element in the logical tree, which inherit the data context, and also the current element itself.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於任何項目邏輯樹狀結構中，目前項目的子項目繼承的資料內容，以及目前的項目本身。
