trans-unit.source: All such existing bindings must re-interpret the new <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> and will reevaluate the binding results.
trans-unit.target: 所有這類的現有繫結必須重新解譯新<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>並會重新評估繫結結果。

trans-unit.source: The data binding engine is not deterministic about the order of these reevaluations, relative to the raising of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結引擎不具決定性的這些處，相對於的引發順序有關<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContextChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The reevaluations can occur before the event, after the event, or in any mixture.
trans-unit.target: 重新評估可能可以事件之前、 發生事件之後，或以任何混合。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key to use to reference the style for this control, when theme styles are used or defined.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可在使用或定義佈景主題樣式時，用來參考這個控制項之樣式的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The style key.
trans-unit.target: 樣式索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: To work correctly as part of theme style lookup, this value is expected to be the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the control being styled.
trans-unit.target: 若要當做佈景主題樣式查閱一部分正常運作，這個值必須是要加上樣式之控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically not set through any of its direct property accessors.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常是透過其直接屬性存取子的任何不設定。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you override the type-specific metadata of this dependency property every time you create a new <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您覆寫這個相依性屬性的特定類型的中繼資料每次您建立新<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: When you derive a control, call the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.OverrideMetadata%2A> method against the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DefaultStyleKeyProperty> identifier, within the static constructor of the control derived class (or equivalent class initialization).
trans-unit.target: 當您衍生的控制項時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.OverrideMetadata%2A>方法針對<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DefaultStyleKeyProperty>控制項中的靜態建構函式中的識別項，衍生類別 （或對等的類別初始化）。

trans-unit.source: A control typically overrides the default value of this property to be its own type, but in some cases could also use a base type for which a style in the theme dictionaries exists.
trans-unit.target: 控制項通常會覆寫它自己的型別，這個屬性的預設值，但在某些情況下也可以使用基底類型有主題字典中的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This is only practical if the control templates of the base control entirely define the visual representation of that derived control, and if whatever additional members the derived types expose do not require additional elements as part of the control template.
trans-unit.target: 如果基底控制項的 [控制項] 範本已完整定義該衍生的控制項的視覺表示法，而且衍生的型別公開的任何其他成員不需要額外的項目控制項範本的一部分，這樣做只實際。

trans-unit.source: If you want your element or control to deliberately not use theme styles, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OverridesDefaultStyle%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要您的項目或故意不使用佈景主題樣式的控制項，設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OverridesDefaultStyle%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the dependency property metadata override usage discussed in Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明的 < 備註 > 中所討論的相依性屬性中繼資料覆寫使用量。

trans-unit.source: This code defines a custom control class `NumericUpDown` intended to be used from a dedicated control library assembly.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼定義的自訂控制項類別`NumericUpDown`適用於從專用的控制項程式庫組件。

trans-unit.source: The illustrated static constructor references some private initialization function, registers a class handler (another common control subclassing scenario; see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md)) and finally overrides the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DefaultStyleKey%2A> dependency property metadata on the `NumericUpDown` class.
trans-unit.target: 參考某些私用的初始化函式所示的靜態建構函式時，註冊類別處理常式 (另一個常見的控制項子類別化案例，請參閱 <<c0> [ 標示路由傳送事件中當做 Handled，和類別處理](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md))，最後覆寫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DefaultStyleKey%2A>相依性屬性的中繼資料上`NumericUpDown`類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DefaultStyleKey%2A> always returns its own type as the intended key, which is the convention that the theme style system uses to look up the style for some arbitrary otherwise non-styled control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DefaultStyleKey%2A> 一律會傳回它自己的型別為預期的索引鍵，這是用來查閱某些任意否則非樣式控制項之樣式的佈景主題樣式系統的慣例。

trans-unit.source: The complete sample also defines the actual control's theme style that is referenced by that key; see [NumericUpDown Custom Control with Theme and UI Automation Support Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025).
trans-unit.target: 完整的範例也會定義該索引鍵所參考的實際控制項佈景主題樣式請參閱[NumericUpDown 自訂控制項搭配主題和 UI 自動化支援範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DefaultStyleKey" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DefaultStyleKey" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the initialization process for the element is complete.
trans-unit.target: 表示項目的初始設定程序已完成。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A> was previously called, the base implementation will raise the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A>之前已呼叫過，基底實作將會引發<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>事件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A> was not called or it could not be determined whether <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A> was called, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> is not raised and an exception is thrown instead.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A>，不會呼叫或找不取決於是否<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A>已呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>就不會引發，並改為擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit" /> was called without <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit" /> having previously been called on the element.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit" /> 時，沒有在項目上先呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit" />。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to provide special handling that should happen when your element is initialized during the element loading process.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法以提供您的項目初始化期間載入處理序的項目時應該發生的特殊處理。

trans-unit.source: Your implementation should call the base implementation, because the base (default) implementation sets some internal flags to keep track of initialization.
trans-unit.target: 您的實作應該呼叫基底實作，因為基底 （預設值） 實作設定追蹤的初始設定部分內部旗標。

trans-unit.source: The name of the requested element.
trans-unit.target: 要求之項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Finds an element that has the provided identifier name.
trans-unit.target: 尋找具有所提供之識別項名稱的項目。

trans-unit.source: The requested element.
trans-unit.target: 要求的項目。

trans-unit.source: This can be <see langword="null" /> if no matching element was found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到相符的項目，則這個項目可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the element has child elements, these child elements are all searched recursively for the requested named element.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目具有子項目，這些子項目會遞迴搜尋所有要求的具名項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A> operates within the current element's namescope.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A> 目前的項目範圍內的運作方式。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: 所要求資源的索引鍵識別項。

trans-unit.source: Searches for a resource with the specified key, and throws an exception if the requested resource is not found.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的索引鍵搜尋資源，如果找不到要求的資源時會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The requested resource.
trans-unit.target: 要求的資源。

trans-unit.source: If no resource with the provided key was found, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到含有所提供索引鍵的資源，便會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="F:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue" /> value might also be returned in the exception case.
trans-unit.target: 在擲回例外狀況時，可能也會傳回 <see cref="F:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method for a key that cannot be found, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您找不到索引鍵呼叫這個方法，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to handle exceptions that result from calling <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindResource%2A>, call <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TryFindResource%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況所導致的呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindResource%2A>，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TryFindResource%2A>改為。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TryFindResource%2A> returns `null` when a requested resource cannot be found, and does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TryFindResource%2A> 傳回`null`當找不到要求的資源，並不會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the resource is not found on the calling element, the parent element in the logical tree is searched next, then the application, then themes, and finally system resources.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫的項目上找不到資源，父項目邏輯樹狀結構中是搜尋下一步，然後應用程式，然後佈景主題，和最後系統資源。

trans-unit.source: This lookup methodology is identical to how the tree is searched if a resource were requested by a dynamic resource reference in markup.
trans-unit.target: 這項查閱方法等同於樹狀結構會如何搜尋如果所要求資源標記中動態資源參考。

trans-unit.source: For more information about resource lookup, see [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需資源查閱的詳細資訊，請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you immediately cast a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindResource%2A> return value to the type of the property that you setting with the returned resource value.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您立即轉換<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindResource%2A>值傳回至屬性的型別，您設定與傳回的資源。

trans-unit.source: Resource keys are not necessarily strings.
trans-unit.target: 資源索引鍵不一定是字串。

trans-unit.source: For instance, styles for controls at the theme level are deliberately keyed to the <xref:System.Type> of the control, and application or page styles for controls typically use this same key convention.
trans-unit.target: 例如，樣式的佈景主題層級的控制項索引鍵，<xref:System.Type>的控制項，和應用程式或網頁的樣式的控制項通常會使用這個相同的金鑰慣例。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md) or [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[設定樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)或[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example obtains a named resource and casts it to an appropriate type to fill a property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會取得一個具名的資源，並將它轉換成適當型別來填滿屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="resourceKey" /> was not found and an event handler does not exist for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="resourceKey" />，<see cref="E:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException" /> 事件的事件處理常式也不存在。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="resourceKey" /> was not found and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Handled" /> property is <see langword="false" /> in the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="resourceKey" />，而且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Handled" /> 屬性是 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException" /> 事件中的 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="resourceKey" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="resourceKey" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction that text and other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements flow within any parent element that controls their layout.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字和其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 項目在任何控制其配置之父項目內的流向。

trans-unit.source: The direction that text and other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements flow within their parent element, as a value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 文字和其他 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 項目在其父項目內的流向，做為列舉型別 (Enumeration) 的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.FlowDirection.LeftToRight" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.FlowDirection.LeftToRight" />。

trans-unit.source: The dependency property usage sets the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> on this element.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性的使用方式設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>這個項目上。

trans-unit.source: Because of property value inheritance, setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> on an element can potentially set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> on all child elements that did not set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> locally or though other means such as styles.
trans-unit.target: 由於設定的屬性值繼承<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>可能可以設定項目上<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>上未設定的所有子項目<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>在本機或透過其他方式，例如樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not automatically set as part of any application culture information, because an element might contain content that is not necessarily intended to obey the general flow direction implied by the culture information.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性未自動設定做為一部分的任何應用程式的文化特性資訊，因為項目可能包含不一定是要遵循的文化特性資訊所隱含的一般流程方向的內容。

trans-unit.source: For more information on globalization considerations, see [Globalization for WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/globalization-for-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關全球化考量的詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 的全球化](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/globalization-for-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property has a defined [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property accessor, so it functions as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性具有已定義[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]屬性存取子，所以它是做為相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, it is also registered as attached, so it can also function as an attached property.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它也會註冊為附加，所以它也可以當作附加屬性。

trans-unit.source: The attached registration is mainly so that property value inheritance is supported, but the property can also be used as a true attached property.
trans-unit.target: 附加的註冊是主要，讓支援繼承屬性值，但此屬性也可用以做為 true 的附加屬性。

trans-unit.source: The attached property usage is only relevant if the object you intend to set the flow direction on has a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> parent element that performs layout upon it, is itself not a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, and does not already have a more directly defined `FlowDirection` property.
trans-unit.target: 附加的屬性的使用方式，才適用，如果您想要設定文字方向上的物件具有<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>的會執行配置時，父項目不是本身<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，而且已經沒有更直接定義`FlowDirection`屬性。

trans-unit.source: (Some of the flow document classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Block> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline> define their own `FlowDirection`, and this property can also set the flow direction.
trans-unit.target: (例如流程的某些文件類別<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Block>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline>自行定義`FlowDirection`，和此屬性也可以設定文字方向。

trans-unit.source: The property value is then read by the eventual content host without requiring attached property usage.)
trans-unit.target: 屬性值會再讀取最終內容主機而不需要附加的屬性使用方式）。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: \<*object* **FlowDirection**="<xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* **FlowDirection**="<xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>"/>

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: This property can also be set on classes that are not <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived classes, by the following [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attached property usage:
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可以設定不是類別上<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>衍生類別中，由下列[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]附加的屬性使用方式：

trans-unit.source: `<` *object* `FrameworkElement.`**FlowDirection**="<xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>`"/>`
trans-unit.target: `<` *物件* `FrameworkElement.` **FlowDirection**="<xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>`"/>`

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentArrange%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentArrange%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is both a dependency property and an attached property; see Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是相依性屬性和附加的屬性。請參閱 < 備註 >。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that enables customization of appearance, effects, or other style characteristics that will apply to this element when it captures keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性可自訂外觀、效果或其他樣式特性，以在這個項目捕捉到鍵盤焦點時套用至項目。

trans-unit.source: The desired style to apply on focus.
trans-unit.target: 要在取得焦點時套用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default value as declared in the dependency property is an empty static <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" />.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性中所宣告的預設值是空的靜態 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" />。

trans-unit.source: However, the effective value at run time is often (but not always) a style as supplied by theme support for controls.
trans-unit.target: 不過，執行階段的有效值通常是 (但不一定總是) 佈景主題支援為控制項所提供的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property affects visual appearance but does not report <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A> in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會影響視覺外觀，但不會報告<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>中繼資料中。

trans-unit.source: This is because the visual appearance change is event-driven and may not apply at all times, and therefore should not generally report any visual or layout information in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為視覺外觀變更是事件驅動和在任何時候，可能不適用，因此通常不應報告中繼資料中的任何視覺效果或版面配置資訊。

trans-unit.source: Conceptually, the visual behavior of focus applied to a control should be coherent from control to control.
trans-unit.target: 在概念上，套用至控制項的焦點視覺行為應該保持一致控制項。

trans-unit.source: The most sensible way to enforce coherence is to only change the focus visual style if you are composing an entire theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在撰寫整個佈景主題，只變更焦點視覺化樣式為最實用的方式，來強制執行一致性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property on individual control styles and not as part of a theme is not the intended usage of this property, because it may lead to a confusing user experience regarding keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性上個別控制項樣式，而非佈景主題的部分不是預定的使用方式，這個屬性，因為它可能會造成混淆的使用者經驗，關於鍵盤焦點。

trans-unit.source: If you are intending control-specific behavior that is deliberately not coherent across a theme, a much better approach is to use triggers in styles for individual input state properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A>, and to do so in a way that does not visually interfere with any existing focus visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果您打算是刻意不一致的佈景主題的控制項特定行為，更好的方法是使用觸發程序在樣式為個別的輸入的狀態的屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A>，以及若要這樣做並不會以方式以視覺化方式會影響任何現有的焦點視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the design intention of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FocusVisualStyle%2A> and alternative focus properties, see [Styling for Focus in Controls, and FocusVisualStyle](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/styling-for-focus-in-controls-and-focusvisualstyle.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關的設計目的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FocusVisualStyle%2A>及替代專注屬性，請參閱[樣式的焦點在控制項和 FocusVisualStyle](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/styling-for-focus-in-controls-and-focusvisualstyle.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *resourceExtension*
trans-unit.target: *resourceExtension*

trans-unit.source: One of the following: , or .
trans-unit.target: 下列其中之一:、 或。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。

trans-unit.source: *styleResourceKey*
trans-unit.target: *styleResourceKey*

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: 識別所要求的樣式的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵參考中現有的資源<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 屬性項目語法是可行，但不是建議。

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[內嵌樣式和樣板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 使用繫結參考或<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>也是可行的但不常見。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FocusVisualStyle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FocusVisualStyle" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> should force the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] to render the cursor as declared by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 是否應強制[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 呈現游標，如 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor" /> 屬性所宣告。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if cursor presentation while over this element is forced to use current <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor" /> settings for the cursor (including on all child elements); otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果游標位於此項目上方時，強制游標展示使用目前游標的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor" /> 設定 (包括在所有子項目上) 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true` you will override the cursor preferences established by child elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將此屬性設定為`true`將會覆寫子項目所建立的資料指標喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: Doing so in general application [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] might be confusing for the user, particularly if child elements are attempting to specify cursors.
trans-unit.target: 這樣做，一般應用程式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]可能會造成混淆的使用者，特別是如果子元素嘗試以指定資料指標。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor%2A> is more appropriate in control subclassing or compositing scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor%2A>中控制項的子類別化或複合 （compositing） 的情況下更適當。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example forces the cursor value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會強制資料指標的值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The target <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> to get the binding from.
trans-unit.target: 要取得繫結的目標 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> that represents the binding on the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" />，表示指定之屬性上的繫結。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> if the target property has an active binding; otherwise, returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標屬性具有使用中的繫結，則傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" />，否則傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Checking the return value for `null` is a technique you can use to determine whether a property has an active binding.
trans-unit.target: 檢查傳回值`null`是一種技術可用來判斷屬性是否有作用中的繫結。

trans-unit.source: This method is really just a convenience wrapper around the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是其實只是方便包裝<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetBindingExpression%2A> passes the current instance and the `dp` parameter to <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetBindingExpression%2A> 將目前的執行個體傳遞和`dp`參數<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The element to return a <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> for.
trans-unit.target: 為其傳回 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> attached property for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得所指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> 附加屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The requested flow direction, as a value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 要求的流程方向，作為列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The main purpose of this method is to support attached property syntax for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> property, therefore allowing child elements of a provided <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> to specify flow direction for the arrangement within their parent element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的主要用途為支援附加的屬性的語法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>屬性，因此允許的提供項目子系<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>以指定的排列方式，其父項目中的資料流程方向。

trans-unit.source: To get the value on the current <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, use the direct [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessor <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得值，在目前<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，使用 direct[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]存取子<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The size of the part of the element that does visual presentation.
trans-unit.target: 視覺呈現的項目部分大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns a geometry for a clipping mask.
trans-unit.target: 傳回裁剪遮罩的幾何。

trans-unit.source: The mask applies if the layout system attempts to arrange an element that is larger than the available display space.
trans-unit.target: 如果配置系統嘗試排列大於可用顯示空間的項目，則會套用這個遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The clipping geometry.
trans-unit.target: 裁剪幾何。

trans-unit.source: Margins will be subtracted from the `layoutSlotSize` as part of layout system behavior.
trans-unit.target: 將減去邊界`layoutSlotSize`版面配置系統行為的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A returned null reference indicates that no clipping will occur.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 null 參考會指出沒有裁剪部分會發生。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns `null` when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作一定會傳回`null`時<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> implementation uses <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A> in its calculations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>實作會使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>在其計算中。

trans-unit.source: Several subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> override this method again.
trans-unit.target: 數個類別的子<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>覆寫這個方法一次。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, overrides to always return `null` because adorners are often deliberately outside the ordinary bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>會覆寫永遠傳回`null`因為裝飾項通常會刻意一般範圍外。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> return `null` if <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>傳回`null`如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns <see langword="null" /> when <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作一定會傳回<see langword="null" />時<see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds" />是<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Overrides are generally expected to preserve this behavior, although there are exceptions, depending on the relationship and purpose of the derived class and its layout logic as opposed to the base class.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫通常仍會保留此行為，但有例外狀況，根據關聯性和衍生的類別和其配置邏輯，而不是基底類別的用途。

trans-unit.source: Name of the child to find.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的子項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the named element in the visual tree of an instantiated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具現化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate" /> 視覺化樹狀結構中的具名項目。

trans-unit.source: The requested element.
trans-unit.target: 要求的項目。

trans-unit.source: May be <see langword="null" /> if no element of the requested name exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果所要求名稱的項目不存在，則可能為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Templates in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] have a self-contained namescope.
trans-unit.target: 中的範本[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]有獨立的名稱範圍。

trans-unit.source: This is because templates are re-used, and any name defined in a template cannot remain unique when multiple instances of a control each instantiate its template.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為樣板是重複使用，而且在範本中定義的任何名稱不能是唯一的當多個執行個體，每個控制項的具現化的範本。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetTemplateChild%2A> method to return references to objects that come from the template after it is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetTemplateChild%2A>方法以傳回物件具現化後，來自範本的參考。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to find items from templates because <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> acts in a more general scope, and there is no connection between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> class itself and the instantiated template once it is applied.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來尋找範本中的項目，因為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>扮演更常見的範圍，而且之間沒有連線<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>類別本身和具現化的範本，一旦套用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> supplies the same function as this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 提供這個方法與相同的功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is public instead of protected, and it uses correct name-scoping considerations that allow it to access the template within an element and find named items within it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 已受到保護而不是公用，並使用正確名稱範圍，使其得以存取的範本內的項目和尋找名為項目的考量。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> when you need to get an element outside of its parent control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>當您需要取得其父控制項以外的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns an alternative logical parent for this element if there is no visual parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有視覺父代，則傳回這個項目的替代邏輯父代。

trans-unit.source: Returns something other than <see langword="null" /> whenever a WPF framework-level implementation of this method has a non-visual parent connection.
trans-unit.target: 每當這個方法的 WPF 架構層級實作具有非視覺父連線時，傳回 <see langword="null" /> 以外的值。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GetUIParentCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GetUIParentCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> implementation returns the expected single visual parent, which is the same result as getting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>實作會傳回預期單一視覺化父項目，也就是相同的結果，以取得<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: Derived class implementations might return alternate parent relationships.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別實作可能會傳回替代的父代關聯性。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the requested child element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中要求的子項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Visual.GetVisualChild(System.Int32)" />, and returns a child at the specified index from a collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Visual.GetVisualChild(System.Int32)" />，並從子項目的集合傳回指定之索引的子項目。

trans-unit.source: The requested child element.
trans-unit.target: 要求的子項目。

trans-unit.source: This should not return <see langword="null" />; if the provided index is out of range, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果所提供的索引超出範圍，則應該不會傳回 <see langword="null" />，而是會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> implementation, the only valid index is zero.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>實作中，唯一有效的索引為零。

trans-unit.source: The content model for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild%2A> supports either zero or one child elements, not a collection.
trans-unit.target: 內容模型的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild%2A>支援零個或一個子項目不是集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how a custom adorner uses the values declared by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection> that it maintains for its multiple visual children.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何自訂裝飾項會使用所宣告的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection>它所維護的多個 visual 的子系。

trans-unit.source: These values are reported through overrides of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這些值會回報的覆寫透過<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is only valid for elements that do not maintain any more descriptive collection of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: 此實作僅適用於不會維護任何更具描述性的集合的視覺化子項目數的項目。

trans-unit.source: Any element that does have such a collection must override this method and map the index to an equivalent index in the child element collection that is supported by that element.
trans-unit.target: 沒有這類集合的任何項目必須覆寫這個方法，並將索引對應至對等的索引中受到該元素的子項目集合。

trans-unit.source: An index in the range from zero to <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount" /> (minus one) should return a valid element; any other index should throw an out-of-range exception.
trans-unit.target: 從零到範圍中的索引<see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount" />（減一） 應該傳回有效的項目; 其他任何索引應該擲回例外狀況超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: An example of an element type that does support a child collection and overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild(System.Int32)" /> to return more than one possible child is <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" />.
trans-unit.target: 範例項目類型的支援子集合，並覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild(System.Int32)" />傳回多個可能的子系是<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation in <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> presumes only one visual child.
trans-unit.target: 中的預設實作<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />會假設只有一個 visual 的子系。

trans-unit.source: Any value passed for <paramref name="index" /> other than zero causes an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞給任何數值<paramref name="index" />非零的例外狀況擲回的原因。

trans-unit.source: Several common elements, such as decorators, adorners, or elements with specialized rendering, override the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> implementation (of the implementation from intermediate base classes).
trans-unit.target: 數個通用的項目，例如裝飾項目、 裝飾項或具有特定的轉譯項目覆寫<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />實作 （從中繼基底類別實作）。

trans-unit.source: Some implementations still enforce one visual child whereas others allow a collection.
trans-unit.target: 某些實作仍強制執行一個 visual 的子系，而其他人可讓集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the suggested height of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目的建議高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the element, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 項目的高度 (以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: This value must be equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 這個值必須等於或大於 0.0。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> is one of three writable properties on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that specify height information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> 其中三個可寫入屬性位於<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>旗標會指定高度資訊。

trans-unit.source: The other two are <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 其他兩個是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If there is a conflict between these values, the order of application for actual height determination is that first <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A> must be honored, then <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>, and finally, if it is within bounds, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 之間有衝突，如果這些值，應用程式的實際高度決定的順序是第一個<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>必須能接受，然後<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>，最後，如果它在範圍內是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If this element is a child element within some other element, then setting this property to a value is really only a suggested value.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目是一些其他項目內的子元素，然後將此屬性設定為值其實只是建議的值。

trans-unit.source: The layout system as well as the particular layout logic of the parent element will use the value as a nonbinding input during the layout process.
trans-unit.target: 版面配置系統，以及特定配置的邏輯父項目會使用值為非繫結輸入配置程序期間。

trans-unit.source: In practical terms, a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> is almost always the child element of something else; even when you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> on <xref:System.Windows.Window>.
trans-unit.target: 實際上，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>是幾乎子元素的意義; 即使在您設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Window>。

trans-unit.source: (For <xref:System.Windows.Window>, that value is used when the underlying application model establishes the basic rendering assumptions that create the Hwnd that hosts the application.)
trans-unit.target: (如<xref:System.Windows.Window>，基礎的應用程式模型建立建立 Hwnd 基本呈現假設時，會使用值主控應用程式。)

trans-unit.source: In addition to acceptable <xref:System.Double> values, this property can also be <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，可接受<xref:System.Double>值，這個屬性也可以是<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This is how you specify auto sizing behavior in code.
trans-unit.target: 這是您在程式碼中指定自動調整大小行為的方式。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] you set the value to the string "Auto" (case insensitive) to enable the auto sizing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]您設定值的字串 「 自動 」 （不區分大小寫） 若要啟用自動調整大小行為。

trans-unit.source: Auto sizing behavior implies that the element will fill the height available to it.
trans-unit.target: 自動調整大小行為表示項目將會填入可用的高度。

trans-unit.source: Note however that specific controls frequently supply default values through their default theme styles that will disable the auto sizing behavior unless it is specifically re-enabled.
trans-unit.target: 不過請注意，特定控制項通常會提供預設值，透過其預設佈景主題樣式，將會停用自動調整大小行為，除非它是特別重新啟用。

trans-unit.source: The return value of this property is always the same as any value that was set to it.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性傳回的值一律為任何已設定為它的值相同。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> may vary.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: This can happen either statically because the layout rejected the suggested size for some reason, or momentarily.
trans-unit.target: 這種情形是以靜態方式因為配置基於某些原因，拒絕建議的大小或立刻顯示。

trans-unit.source: The layout system itself works asynchronously relative to the property system's set of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> and may not have processed that particular sizing property change yet.
trans-unit.target: 版面配置系統本身會在相對於的屬性系統組以非同步方式運作<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>並不一定有處理該特定尚未調整大小屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: The value restrictions on the <xref:System.Double> value are enforced by a <xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback> mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 值限制<xref:System.Double>值會強制執行<xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback>機制。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set an invalid value, a run-time exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試設定無效的值時，會擲回執行階段例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the validation check, there is a nondeterministic upper value bound for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> that is enforced by the layout system (this is a very large number, larger than <xref:System.Single.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> but smaller than <xref:System.Double.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: 驗證檢查，除了沒有繫結的不具決定性上限數值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>的版面配置系統會強制執行 (這是非常大數目，大於<xref:System.Single.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>但小於<xref:System.Double.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: If you exceed this bound, the element will not render, and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果超過此限制，將不會呈現項目，並擲回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Do not set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> to a value that is significantly larger than the maximum size of any possible visual display, or you may exceed this nondeterministic upper bound.
trans-unit.target: 請勿設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>大幅超過大小上限的任何可能的視覺顯示，或者您可能會超過此不具決定性的上限值。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示法<xref:System.Double>等於或大於 0.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for upper bound information.
trans-unit.target: 如需上限資訊，請參閱＜備註＞。

trans-unit.source: This value is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體的值`1`是可接受。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*值 （如上所述），後面接著下列單元宣告字串的其中之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` 為英吋。1in = = 96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
**Auto**
trans-unit.target: **Auto**

trans-unit.source: Enables autosizing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 啟用自動調整大小行為。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱＜備註＞。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment characteristics applied to this element when it is composed within a parent element, such as a panel or items control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至此元素在父項元素 (例如面板或項目控制項) 中組成時的水平對齊特性。

trans-unit.source: A horizontal alignment setting, as a value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此水平對齊方式設定作為列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> properties are explicitly set on an element, these measurements take higher precedent during layout and will cancel the typical effects of setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>屬性已明確設定項目上，這些度量在配置期間需要更高的優先順序，將會取消一般設定作用的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> is the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] property accessor for what is in reality a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]實際上會相依性屬性的屬性存取子。

trans-unit.source: This particular dependency property quite frequently has its apparent "default" value set differently in subclassed elements, particularly controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個特定的相依性屬性經常會有子類別化項目，特別是控制項中以不同方式設定其明顯"default"值。

trans-unit.source: This generally occurs in one of two ways: the dependency property is re-registered to a particular subclass, but with different metadata for setting its defaults; or there is a default style being applied that sets that dependency property value differently.
trans-unit.target: 這通常發生在兩種方式之一： 重新登錄相依性屬性的特定子類別，但具有不同的中繼資料來設定其預設值。或以不同的方式設定該相依性屬性的值為預設樣式套用。

trans-unit.source: For example, the apparent "default" of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> control will be <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, even though <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> inherits <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> direct from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，明顯 「 預設 」 的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>控制項將會是<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>，即使<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>繼承<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>直接從<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>。

trans-unit.source: This is because that value was reset within the default style of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, within the style's control template.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為該值重設的預設樣式中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>，樣式的控制項範本內。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> does not use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> when composing layout, because <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> is based on absolute positioning.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> 不會使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>撰寫版面配置，因為時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>根據絕對位置。

trans-unit.source: When inherited by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> or derived classes, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> redefines the default value of this dependency property to be <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>.
trans-unit.target: 當繼承<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>或衍生類別，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>會重新定義為此相依性屬性的預設值<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scope limits for property value inheritance, resource key lookup, and RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性值繼承的範圍限制、資源索引鍵查閱，以及 RelativeSource FindAncestor 查閱。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior.Default" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior.Default" />。

trans-unit.source: Certain boundaries in the element tree set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InheritanceBehavior%2A> to deliberately limit the scope of inheritance behavior, to a force resource lookup to check the application resources, or to prevent a RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup from querying the current element or any further.
trans-unit.target: 項目中的特定界限樹狀組<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InheritanceBehavior%2A>刻意限制的繼承行為，強制資源查閱檢查應用程式資源，或防止 RelativeSource FindAncestor 查閱查詢目前的項目範圍內或任何進一步。

trans-unit.source: RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup occurs when a binding uses a <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> that has its <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property set to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用繫結，就會發生 RelativeSource FindAncestor 查閱<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>具有其<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor?displayProperty=nameWithType>值。

trans-unit.source: If you want your derived class to set this property, you should do so within the static constructor or in other initialization routines.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要將此屬性設定衍生的類別，您應該在靜態建構函式或其他初始化常式中如此做。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 當這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 初始化時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event coincides with cases where the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized" /> property changes from <see langword="false" /> (or undefined) to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件符合 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized" /> 屬性值從 <see langword="false" /> (或未定義) 變更為 <see langword="true" /> 的案例。

trans-unit.source: This event will be raised whenever the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnVisualParentChanged%2A> methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 此事件將在每次引發<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnVisualParentChanged%2A>呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: Calls to either method could have come from application code, or through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor behavior when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page is processed.
trans-unit.target: 任一種方法的呼叫可以有來自應用程式程式碼，或透過[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器的行為時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理網頁。

trans-unit.source: Whether you choose to handle <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> depends on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您是否選擇處理<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>取決於您的需求。

trans-unit.source: If you do not need to read element properties, intend to reset properties, and do not need any layout information, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> might be the better event to act upon.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要讀取項目屬性，想要重設的屬性，並不需要任何配置資訊，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>可能會更好的事件，以根據採取行動。

trans-unit.source: If you need all properties of the element to be available, and you will be setting properties that are likely to reset the layout, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> might be the better event to act upon.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要的項目，才能使用，所有屬性，而且您將設定重設配置，可能是屬性<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>可能會更好的事件，以根據採取行動。

trans-unit.source: Be careful of reentrancy if your handler resets any properties that are interpreted by the layout system to mean that a new layout pass is required.
trans-unit.target: 請小心重新進入的如果您的處理常式會由配置系統表示新的配置傳遞需要解譯任何屬性重設。

trans-unit.source: (You might need to check the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> values on the property if you are unsure of which properties can require a new layout pass if they are changed.)
trans-unit.target: (您可能需要檢查<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>屬性，如果您不確定哪些屬性可以要求新的版面配置上的值通過，在變更時。)

trans-unit.source: For more information about the sequence of object events for a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, and also for several related application and element classes, see [Object Lifetime Events](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊有關順序的物件事件<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，以及是否有數個相關應用程式和項目類別，請參閱[物件存留期事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the context for input used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 所用的輸入內容。

trans-unit.source: The input scope, which modifies how input from alternative input methods is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 輸入範圍，可修改替代輸入法之輸入的解譯方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" /> (which results in a default handling of commands).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" /> (這會導致命令的預設處理)。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property inherits property values.
trans-unit.target: 這個相依性屬性會繼承屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If there are child elements without other values for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A> established through local values or styles, then the property system will set the value to be the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A> value of the nearest ancestor element with this value assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有其他值的項目子系<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A>透過本機值或樣式，所建立，則對屬性系統將會設定這個值為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A>指派此值與最接近的祖系項目的值。

trans-unit.source: Although a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax usage is listed and is syntactically allowed, setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is not common.
trans-unit.target: 雖然[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]語法使用量列為和語法上允許中, 設定這個屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]並不常見。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this element has been initialized, either during processing by a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor, or by explicitly having its <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit" /> method called.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示此項目是否已初始化，初始化方式可能是在由 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 處理器處理期間，或明確地呼叫其 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit" /> 方法而進行初始化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is initialized per the aforementioned [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processing or method calls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目已根據先前提到 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 的處理或方法呼叫來初始化則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property may also be `true` if this element has been moved within the logical tree such that it has a new parent element, and therefore becomes reloaded again.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可能`true`如果此項目已移動邏輯樹狀結構內，使它有新的父項目，並且因此變成一次重新載入。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful if you also are using <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您也會使用這個屬性很有用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Elements in the logical tree that is loaded by a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor are assured to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯樹狀結構中所載入的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器會確保進行初始化。

trans-unit.source: Elements not in the logical tree are initialized when <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 不在邏輯樹狀結構中的元素會初始化時<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: In absence of any specific handling of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A>, this will happen as soon as the constructor returns the initialized result.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何特定處理的情況下<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A>，建構函式會傳回初始化的結果時，會發生此情況。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this element has been loaded for presentation.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示此項目是否已載入以供展示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current element is attached to an element tree; <see langword="false" /> if the element has never been attached to a loaded element tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前項目是附加至項目樹狀結構則為 <see langword="true" />，如果項目從未附加至已載入的項目樹狀結構則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: From a newly constructed <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, this property starts off `false`, and remains `true` after it is set to `true`, even if the element is subsequently removed from a connected logical tree by code.
trans-unit.target: 從新建構<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，這個屬性一開始`false`，且會維持`true`設為它之後`true`，即使之後移除元素已連線的邏輯樹狀結構中程式碼。

trans-unit.source: `true` state is set by the general presentation logic when elements are loaded into the presentation engine.
trans-unit.target: `true` 狀態是項目會載入簡報引擎時設定的一般呈現邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Typically, loaded elements are rendered, but not all <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived classes have a presentation, and other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> can influence presentation.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，載入項目會轉譯，但不是全部<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>衍生的類別中有一份簡報和其他屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A>可能會影響簡報。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements two handlers: one is handling the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> event of the root element, so it is certain that the page root element is loaded because that is the significance of the event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會實作兩個處理常式： 一個處理<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>的根項目，所以某些已載入頁面的根項目，因為這是事件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The other handler is hooked to a user control, and calls <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsLoaded%2A> to assure that the root element is loaded completely.
trans-unit.target: 此處理常式會攔截到使用者控制項，並呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsLoaded%2A>，以確保根項目會載入完全。

trans-unit.source: Both handlers call the same function (not shown) that will populate child elements with fresh data.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個處理常式呼叫相同的函式 （未顯示），將會填入子項目，以更新的資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets localization/globalization language information that applies to an element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至項目的當地語系化/全球化語言資訊。

trans-unit.source: The language information for this element.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目的語言資訊。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" /> with its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag" /> value set to the string "en-US".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" />，且其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag" /> 值設定為 "en-US" 字串。

trans-unit.source: The string formats follow the RFC 3066 standard.
trans-unit.target: 字串格式會依照 RFC 3066 標準。

trans-unit.source: For example, U.S. English is "en-US".
trans-unit.target: 例如，美國英文是"EN-US"。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the values and format, see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.
trans-unit.target: 如需值和格式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property inherits property values.
trans-unit.target: 這個相依性屬性會繼承屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If there are child elements without other values for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> established through local values or styles, the property system will set the value to be the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> value of the nearest ancestor element with this value assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有其他值的項目子系<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A>建立透過本機值或樣式，對屬性系統將會設定為值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A>指派此值與最接近的祖系項目的值。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] defines the general meaning of the `xml:lang` attribute.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 定義的一般意義`xml:lang`屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> essentially exposes the meaning of this attribute as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> 基本上會公開這個屬性為相依性屬性的意義。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> can be adjusted programmatically, and can participate in property system value inheritance in a way that parallels how the `xml:lang` attribute can inherit to child element scope in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> 可以透過程式設計的方式，調整，而且可以參與平行設計的方式的屬性系統值繼承如何`xml:lang`屬性可以繼承中的子系項目範圍[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A>, that value becomes the `xml:lang` and overwrites any previous value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A>，此值會變成`xml:lang`並覆寫任何先前的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [xml:lang Handling in XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xml-lang-handling-in-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[xml: lang 處理在 XAML 中](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xml-lang-handling-in-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a graphics transformation that should apply to this element when layout is performed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定應在執行配置時，套用在這個項目圖形轉換。

trans-unit.source: The transform this element should use.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目應使用的轉換。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Transform.Identity" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Transform.Identity" />。

trans-unit.source: In contrast to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> will affect results of layout.
trans-unit.target: 相對於<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>會影響結果的版面配置。

trans-unit.source: Setting a transform provides powerful capabilities of scaling and rotating.
trans-unit.target: 設定轉換提供強大的縮放和旋轉的功能。

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> ignores <xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform> operations.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>忽略<xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform>作業。

trans-unit.source: This is because the layout system behavior for child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> auto-corrects any offsets to the position of a scaled or rotated element into the layout and coordinate system of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為子項目的的版面配置系統行為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>自動更正任何位移的縮放或旋轉項目到配置的位置和座標系統的父項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> can lead to poor application performance if you invoke it in a scenario that does not require a full pass by the layout system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> 如果您不需要完全傳遞配置系統案例中叫用會導致效能不佳的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>, it triggers a new pass by the layout system and forces all on-screen objects to be remeasured and rearranged.
trans-unit.target: 當您將套用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>觸發新的行程由配置系統，強制所有螢幕物件 remeasured 和重新排列。

trans-unit.source: If you are updating the complete application [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], this functionality might be exactly what you need.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要更新的完整應用程式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，這項功能可能完全您的需要。

trans-unit.source: However, if you do not need a full layout pass, use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A> property, which does not invoke the layout system, and therefore, is typically a better choice for this scenario.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您不需要完整的配置傳遞，使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A>屬性，它不會叫用這個版面配置系統，並因此，通常是比較好的選擇，此案例。

trans-unit.source: Example scenarios where <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> would be useful include: rotating elements such as menu components from horizontal to vertical or vice versa, scaling elements (zooming in) on focus, providing editing behavior, etc.
trans-unit.target: 範例案例其中<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>有用包括： 旋轉元素，例如功能表元件從水平為垂直或反之亦然，縮放比例元素 （拉近） 焦點，提供編輯行為，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to apply a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> to an element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何套用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>的項目。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and hosts it within a parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>和裝載在父<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> property to apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 它也會使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>屬性，將套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the element is laid out, rendered, and ready for interaction.
trans-unit.target: 當項目已配置版面、呈現以及可以互動時發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> is usually the last event raised in an element initialization sequence.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> 通常是最後一個事件中引發的項目初始化順序。

trans-unit.source: It will always be raised after <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>.
trans-unit.target: 它將會引發這個事件之後<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>。

trans-unit.source: Whether you choose to handle <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> depends on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您是否選擇處理<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>取決於您的需求。

trans-unit.source: If you do not need to read element properties, intend to reset properties, and do not need any layout information, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> might be the better event to act upon.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要讀取項目屬性，想要重設的屬性，並不需要任何配置資訊，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>可能會更好的事件，以根據採取行動。

trans-unit.source: If you need all properties of the element to be available, and you will be setting properties that are likely to reset the layout, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> might be the better event to act upon.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要的項目，才能使用，所有屬性，而且您將設定重設配置，可能是屬性<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>可能會更好的事件，以根據採取行動。

trans-unit.source: Be careful of reentrancy if your handler resets any properties that are interpreted by the layout system to mean that a new layout pass is required.
trans-unit.target: 請小心重新進入的如果您的處理常式會由配置系統表示新的配置傳遞需要解譯任何屬性重設。

trans-unit.source: (You might need to check the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> values on the property if you are unsure of which properties can require a new layout pass if they are changed.)
trans-unit.target: (您可能需要檢查<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>屬性，如果您不確定哪些屬性可以要求新的版面配置上的值通過，在變更時。)

trans-unit.source: For more information about the sequence of object events for a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, and also for several related application and element classes, see [Object Lifetime Events](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊有關順序的物件事件<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，以及是否有數個相關應用程式和項目類別，請參閱[物件存留期事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md)。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do not follow a route, they are only handled within the same element on which they are raised.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件不會遵循路由，才會處理在引發相同的項目內。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do support other routed event behavior: they support an accessible handlers collection, and can be used as an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件並支援其他路由的事件的行為： 它們支援可存取的處理常式集合中，且可用來當作<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>樣式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded> might both be raised on controls as a result of user-initiated system theme changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> 和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded>可能同時會引發由於使用者啟動系統的佈景主題變更的控制項上。

trans-unit.source: A theme change causes an invalidation of the control template and the contained visual tree, which in turn causes the entire control to unload and reload.
trans-unit.target: 佈景主題變更會導致控制項樣板和自主視覺化樹狀結構，因此使得卸載再重新載入整個控制項的失效。

trans-unit.source: Therefore <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> cannot be assumed to occur only when a page is first loaded through navigation to the page.
trans-unit.target: 因此<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>無法假設發生只頁面第一次載入時透過巡覽至頁面。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Direct
trans-unit.target: 直接

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for logical child elements of this element.
trans-unit.target: 為此項目的邏輯子項目取得列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for logical child elements of this element.
trans-unit.target: 此項目之邏輯子項目的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LogicalChildren%2A> allows you to iterate over child elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LogicalChildren%2A> 可讓您逐一查看項目子系。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for elements that may not have a defined, dedicated collection but still contain more than one child element, particularly <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> child elements.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於項目可能沒有定義且固定的集合，但仍然會包含一個以上的子元素，特別是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>子項目。
