trans-unit.source: For more information on how to use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LogicalChildren%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.AddLogicalChild%2A>, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LogicalChildren%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.AddLogicalChild%2A>，請參閱[中 WPF 樹狀架構](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the outer margin of an element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目的外邊界。

trans-unit.source: Provides margin values for the element.
trans-unit.target: 提供項目的邊界值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" /> with all properties equal to 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" />，其中具有所有等於 0 (零) 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The margin is the space between this element and other elements that will be adjacent when layout creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 邊界是這個項目和其他配置建立時將相鄰的項目之間的間距[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Shared elements might be peer elements (such as other elements in the collection of a common parent control), or might also be this element's parent.
trans-unit.target: 共用的項目可能是對等項目 （例如中其他項目的一般父控制項的集合），或也可能是此項目的父代。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A> is set as a <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> structure rather than as a number so that the margin can be set asymmetrically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A> 設定為<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>結構，而不是數字，讓對稱性設定邊界。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> structure itself supports string type conversion so that you can specify an asymmetric <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attribute syntax also.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Thickness>結構本身支援字串型別轉換，好讓您可以指定非對稱<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A>中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]也屬性語法。

trans-unit.source: A non-zero margin applies space outside the element layout's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非零邊界適用於外部項目配置的空間<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Margins are additive for sibling elements in a layout; for example, two adjacent elements both with a margin of 30 set on the adjoining edge would have 60 units of space between them.
trans-unit.target: 邊界會加總的同層級項目在版面配置。例如，都與 30 的邊界設定邊緣相鄰的兩個相鄰項目會有 60 之間的空間單位。

trans-unit.source: Elements that have margins set will not typically constrain the size of the specified <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A> if the allotted rectangle space is not large enough for the margin plus the element content area.
trans-unit.target: 已設定邊界的項目將不會通常限制指定的大小<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A>配置的矩形空間不是已夠大，邊界以及元素內容區域。

trans-unit.source: The element content area will be constrained instead when layout is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 計算配置時，將會改為限制項目的內容區域。

trans-unit.source: The only case where margins would be constrained also is if the content is already constrained all the way to zero.
trans-unit.target: 邊界會被限制的唯一情況也是內容已被限制到零。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *left, top, right, bottom*
trans-unit.target: *左、 上、 靠右下*

trans-unit.source: Number values between 0 and <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity> that specify the four possible dimension properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> structure.
trans-unit.target: 數字值介於 0 和<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>旗標會指定四個可能維度屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>結構。

trans-unit.source: The attribute usage will also accept abbreviated values that apply in the order provided, symmetrically and logically.
trans-unit.target: 屬性使用方式也會接受縮寫對稱與邏輯上提供的順序套用的值。

trans-unit.source: For instance, `Margin="20"` will be interpreted to mean a <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> with all properties set to 20.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，`Margin="20"`會解譯成表示<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>且其所有屬性設定為 20。

trans-unit.source: `Margin="20,50"` will be interpreted to mean a <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> with <xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Left%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Right%2A> set to 20, and <xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Top%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Bottom%2A> set to 50.
trans-unit.target: `Margin="20,50"` 將解譯成表示<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>與<xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Left%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Right%2A>設為 20，和<xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Top%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Bottom%2A>設定為 50。

trans-unit.source: The default unit for a <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> measure is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 預設單位<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>量值是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify other units by appending the unit type strings `cm`, `in`, or `pt` to any measure.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以藉由附加單位類型字串來指定其他單位`cm`， `in`，或`pt`任何量值。

trans-unit.source: Number values provided as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attributes need not specify decimal points (0 is acceptable, does not have to be provided as 0.0).
trans-unit.target: 數字作為值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]屬性不需要指定小數位數 （0 是可以接受的並沒有提供的 0.0)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage, see <xref:System.Windows.Thickness>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用量，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>。

trans-unit.source: *thicknessReference*
trans-unit.target: *thicknessReference*

trans-unit.source: An object reference to an existing <xref:System.Windows.Thickness>.
trans-unit.target: 將現有的物件參考<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>。

trans-unit.source: This might be a `}`, a , or `}` reference.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是`}`、 a、 或`}`參考。

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage, see <xref:System.Windows.Thickness>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用量，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum height constraint of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定元素的最大高度限制。

trans-unit.source: The maximum height of the element, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 項目的最大高度，以[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />。

trans-unit.source: This value can be any value equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是等於或大於 0.0 的任何值。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> is also valid.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> 也是有效的。

trans-unit.source: This is one of three properties on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that specify height information.
trans-unit.target: 這是三個屬性的其中一個上<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>旗標會指定高度資訊。

trans-unit.source: The other two are <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 其他兩個是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If there is a conflict between these values, the order of application for actual height determination is first <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A> must be honored, then <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>, and finally if each of these are within bounds, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些值之間沒有衝突，實際高度判斷應用程式的順序是第一個<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>必須能接受，然後<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>，最後如果每個範圍中，在<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value restrictions on the <xref:System.Double> value are enforced by a <xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback> mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 值限制<xref:System.Double>值會強制執行<xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback>機制。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set an invalid value a run-time exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試設定無效的值會擲回執行階段例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示法<xref:System.Double>等於或大於 0.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體的值`1`是可接受。

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply, except that you must use [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md) if you need to explicitly set the value to be <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>.
trans-unit.target: 相同<xref:System.Double>套用屬性值 > 一節中所述的範圍限制，只不過您必須使用[X:static 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)如果您需要明確地設定這個值為<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*值 （如上所述），後面接著下列單元宣告字串的其中之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` 為英吋。1in = = 96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum width constraint of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定元素的最大寬度限制。

trans-unit.source: The maximum width of the element, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 項目的最大寬度，以[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />。

trans-unit.source: This value can be any value equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是等於或大於 0.0 的任何值。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> is also valid.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> 也是有效的。

trans-unit.source: This is one of three properties on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that specify width information.
trans-unit.target: 這是三個屬性的其中一個上<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>旗標會指定寬度資訊。

trans-unit.source: The other two are <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 其他兩個是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If there is a conflict between these values, the order of application for actual width determination is first <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A> must be honored, then <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>, and finally if each of these are within bounds, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些值之間沒有衝突，這是第一次應用程式的實際寬度判斷順序<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A>必須能接受，然後<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>，最後如果每個範圍中，在<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value restrictions on the <xref:System.Double> value are enforced by a <xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback> mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 值限制<xref:System.Double>值會強制執行<xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback>機制。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set an invalid value, a run-time exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試設定無效的值時，會擲回執行階段例外狀況。

trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.

`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The available size that the parent element can give to the child elements.
trans-unit.target: 父項目可以提供給子項目使用的大小。

trans-unit.source: Implements basic measure-pass layout system behavior for <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 實作基本的測量傳遞配置系統行為。

trans-unit.source: The desired size of this element in layout.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目在配置中需要的大小。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to connect the WPF core-level and WPF framework-level layout measure implementations.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>連接 WPF 核心層級和 WPF 架構層級配置量值實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> implementation seals the method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>實作密封方法。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the measure pass layout behavior of any element that builds on the WPF framework-level, override <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整 WPF 架構層級為基礎的任何項目的測量行程配置行為，請覆寫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>改為。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the measure pass layout behavior of an element that deliberately does not build on the WPF framework-level or use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整量值會傳遞刻意不會在 WPF 架構層級上建置或使用的項目配置行為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The available size that this element can give to child elements.
trans-unit.target: 此項目可提供給子項目使用的大小。

trans-unit.source: Infinity can be specified as a value to indicate that the element will size to whatever content is available.
trans-unit.target: 此值可以指定為無限大，表示項目會隨著可用的內容而改變大小。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, measures the size in layout required for child elements and determines a size for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />-derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，為子項目測量所需配置的大小，並且判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 所衍生類別的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size that this element determines it needs during layout, based on its calculations of child element sizes.
trans-unit.target: 大小，此項目會依據其計算子項目的大小結果，決定配置時所需的大小。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A> to implement custom layout sizing behavior for your element as it participates in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout system.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>來實作您的項目自訂版面配置調整大小行為，如在參與[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]版面配置系統。

trans-unit.source: Your implementation should do the following:
trans-unit.target: 您的實作應該執行下列作業：

trans-unit.source: Iterate your element's particular collection of children that are part of layout, call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> on each child element.
trans-unit.target: 逐一查看項目的特定集合的子系屬於配置中，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>每個子項目上。

trans-unit.source: Immediately get <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A> on the child (this is set as a property after <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called).
trans-unit.target: 立即取得<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>的子系上 (這設定為屬性之後<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>稱為)。

trans-unit.source: Compute the net desired size of the parent based upon the measurement of the child elements.
trans-unit.target: 計算父系的子項目測量為基礎的網路所需的大小。

trans-unit.source: The return value of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A> should be the element's own desired size, which then becomes the measure input for the parent element of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>應該是項目的自己所需大小，就會變成目前的項目之父元素的輸入量值。

trans-unit.source: This same process continues through the layout system until the root element of the page is reached.
trans-unit.target: 同樣的程序會在頁面的根項目為止，持續進行的版面配置系統。

trans-unit.source: During this process, child elements might return a larger <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A> size than the initial `availableSize` to indicate that the child element wants more space.
trans-unit.target: 在此過程中，子元素可能會傳回較大<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>大小比初始`availableSize`來表示的子項目想更多空間。

trans-unit.source: This might be handled in your own implementation by introducing a scrollable region, by resizing the parent control, by establishing some manner of stacked order, or any number of solutions for measuring or arranging content.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會藉由引進可捲動區域，藉由建立某些方式堆疊的順序或任何數目的解決方案來進行測量或排列內容調整父控制項、 處理中您自己的實作。

trans-unit.source: Elements should call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> on each child during this process, otherwise the child elements will not be correctly sized or arranged.
trans-unit.target: 項目應該呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>在此程序期間每個子系，否則子項目會無法正確調整大小或排列。

trans-unit.source: The following non-compiling code shows this implementation pattern.
trans-unit.target: 下列非編譯程式碼會示範這項實作模式。

trans-unit.source: <c>VisualChildren</c> represents an enumerable collection property of children that your own element should define.
trans-unit.target: <c>VisualChildren</c>代表您自己的項目應該定義的子系的可列舉集合屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property can be named anything.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以命名為任何項目。

trans-unit.source: <c>VisualChildren</c> is a placeholder name for purposes of this example, <c>VisualChildren</c> is not an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] as provided by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] or a part of a naming pattern..
trans-unit.target: <c>VisualChildren</c>是基於此範例中，以替代名稱<c>VisualChildren</c>不[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]所提供[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]或部分的命名模式...

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum height constraint of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定元素的最小高度限制。

trans-unit.source: The minimum height of the element, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 項目的最小高度，以[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: This value can be any value equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是等於或大於 0.0 的任何值。

trans-unit.source: However, <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> is NOT valid, nor is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" /> 都是「無效」值。

trans-unit.source: This is one of three properties on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that specify height information.
trans-unit.target: 這是三個屬性的其中一個上<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>旗標會指定高度資訊。

trans-unit.source: The other two are <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 其他兩個是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If there is a conflict between these values, the order of application for actual height determination is first <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A> must be honored, then <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>, and finally if each of these are within bounds, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些值之間沒有衝突，實際高度判斷應用程式的順序是第一個<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>必須能接受，然後<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>，最後如果每個範圍中，在<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value restrictions on the <xref:System.Double> value are enforced by a <xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback> mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 值限制<xref:System.Double>值會強制執行<xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback>機制。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set an invalid value, a run-time exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試設定無效的值時，會擲回執行階段例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示法<xref:System.Double>等於或大於 0.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體的值`1`是可接受。

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply.
trans-unit.target: 相同<xref:System.Double>套用屬性值 > 一節中所述的範圍限制。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*值 （如上所述），後面接著下列單元宣告字串的其中之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` 為英吋。1in = = 96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum width constraint of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定元素的最小寬度限制。

trans-unit.source: The minimum width of the element, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 項目的最小寬度，以[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: This value can be any value equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是等於或大於 0.0 的任何值。

trans-unit.source: However, <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> is not valid, nor is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" /> 都是無效值。

trans-unit.source: This is one of three properties on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that specify width information.
trans-unit.target: 這是三個屬性的其中一個上<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>旗標會指定寬度資訊。

trans-unit.source: The other two are <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 其他兩個是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If there is a conflict between these values, the order of application for actual width determination is first <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A> must be honored, then <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>, and finally if each of these are within bounds, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些值之間沒有衝突，這是第一次應用程式的實際寬度判斷順序<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A>必須能接受，然後<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>，最後如果每個範圍中，在<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value restrictions on the <xref:System.Double> value are enforced by a <xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback> mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 值限制<xref:System.Double>值會強制執行<xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback>機制。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set an invalid value, a run-time exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試設定無效的值時，會擲回執行階段例外狀況。

trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.target: 字串表示法<xref:System.Double>等於或大於 0.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.

trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The direction that focus is to be moved, as a value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 要移動焦點的方向，以列舉型別 (Enumeration) 的值表示。

trans-unit.source: Moves the keyboard focus away from this element and to another element in a provided traversal direction.
trans-unit.target: 以所提供的周遊方向，將鍵盤焦點從這個項目移到其他項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if focus is moved successfully; <see langword="false" /> if the target element in direction as specified does not exist or could not be keyboard focused.
trans-unit.target: 若成功移動焦點則傳回 <see langword="true" />，若所指定之方向的目標項目不存在，或無法成為鍵盤導向，則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This implementation overrides <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MoveFocus%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and seals the method.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MoveFocus%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和密封方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a handler that handles several possible button inputs.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會實作處理數個可能的按鈕輸入處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Each button represents a possible <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>.
trans-unit.target: 每個按鈕表示可能<xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>。

trans-unit.source: The handler tracks the element with current keyboard focus, and calls <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> on that element, by specifying the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection> as initialization for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest> type parameter provided.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式會追蹤目前的鍵盤焦點，並呼叫的項目<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A>該元素，指定適當的<xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>初始化為<xref:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest>型別參數提供。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identifying name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目的識別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name provides a reference so that code-behind, such as event handler code, can refer to a markup element after it is constructed during processing by a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor.
trans-unit.target: 這個名稱提供參考，使程式碼後置 (Code-Behind) (例如，事件處理常式程式碼) 可以在由 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 處理器處理期間建構之後，參考至標記事件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The most common usage of this property is to specify a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] element name as an attribute in markup.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的最常見的使用方式是指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]做為屬性標記的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property essentially provides a WPF framework-level convenience property to set the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性基本上會提供 WPF 架構層級方便的屬性來設定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [X:name 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)。

trans-unit.source: Names must be unique within a namescope.
trans-unit.target: 名稱必須是唯一的名稱範圍內。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。

trans-unit.source: Getting a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> if you are creating elements in code is not common.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>如果您要建立項目中的程式碼並不常見。

trans-unit.source: If you have the appropriate reference in code already, you can just call methods and properties on the element reference and will not generally need the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經在程式碼中有適當的參考，您可以直接呼叫方法和屬性項目上的參考，而且通常不會需要<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An exception to this is if the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> string has some overloaded meaning, for instance if it is useful to display that name in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個例外狀況是如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>字串具有某些多載意義，例如是否要顯示在該名稱很有用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Setting a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> from code-behind if the original <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> was set from markup is also not recommended, and changing the property after loading the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will not change the original object reference.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>從程式碼後置如果原始<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>已從標記設定也不建議，並於載入後變更屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]不會變更原始的物件參考。

trans-unit.source: The object references are created only when the underlying namescopes are explicitly created during parsing.
trans-unit.target: 只有在剖析期間明確建立的基礎命名範圍時，會建立物件參考。

trans-unit.source: You must specifically call <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RegisterName%2A> to make an effective change to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property of an already loaded element.
trans-unit.target: 您必須特別呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RegisterName%2A>進行有效變更<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>已經載入的項目屬性。

trans-unit.source: One notable case where setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> from code is important is when registering names for elements that storyboards will run against, so that they can be referenced at run time.
trans-unit.target: 一個值得注意的大小寫設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>從程式碼很重要時，才能註冊名稱，將分鏡腳本的項目執行，以便在執行階段可以參考它們。

trans-unit.source: Before you can register a name, might also need to instantiate and assign a <xref:System.Windows.NameScope> instance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以註冊之前，可能也需要具現化，並指派<xref:System.Windows.NameScope>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: See the Example section, or [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節中，或[概觀腳本](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> from code has limited applications, but getting an element by <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> is more common.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>從程式碼具有有限的應用程式，但取得項目<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>更常見。

trans-unit.source: One particular scenario is if your application supports a navigation model where pages reload into the application, and the run time code is not necessarily code-behind defined for that page.
trans-unit.target: 一個特定案例中，這是您的應用程式是否支援頁面會重新載入至應用程式，而執行的階段程式碼不一定是程式碼後置定義該網頁瀏覽模型。

trans-unit.source: The utility method <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A>, which is available from any <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, can find any element by <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> in the logical tree for that element, searching the tree recursively as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 公用程式方法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A>，這是可從任何<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，可以找到任何元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>該項目的邏輯樹狀結構中，搜尋視樹狀目錄中以遞迴方式。

trans-unit.source: Or you can use the <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.FindLogicalNode%2A> static method of <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>, which also takes a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> string as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 或者您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.FindLogicalNode%2A>靜態方法<xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>，這也會採用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>做為引數的字串。

trans-unit.source: Typically used root elements (<xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> for example) implement the interface <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>.
trans-unit.target: 常用根項目 (<xref:System.Windows.Window>，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>例如) 實作的介面<xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this interface are expected to enforce that names be unambiguous within their scope.
trans-unit.target: 此介面的實作應該強制執行的名稱是其範圍內模稜兩可。

trans-unit.source: The root elements that define this interface also define the namescope behavior boundaries for all the related [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 定義這個介面的根項目也將 namescope 行為界限定義所有相關[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property also serves as an identifier for other processes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>屬性也可做為其他處理序的識別項。

trans-unit.source: For instance, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation model will use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> as the AutomationId for clients and providers.
trans-unit.target: 比方說， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation 模型將使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>為用戶端和提供者的 AutomationId。

trans-unit.source: The string values used for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> have some restrictions, as imposed by the underlying [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md) defined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] specification.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的字串值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>有一些限制，如基礎所加諸[X:name 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)所定義[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]規格。

trans-unit.source: Most notably, a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> must start with a letter or the underscore character (_), and must contain only letters, digits, or underscores.
trans-unit.target: 最值得注意的是，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>必須以字母或底線字元 (_) 開頭，而且必須包含字母、 數字或底線。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> is one of the very few dependency properties that cannot be animated (<xref:System.Windows.UIPropertyMetadata.IsAnimationProhibited%2A> is `true` in metadata), because the name itself is vital for targeting an animation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> 是非常少無法以動畫顯示的相依性屬性的其中一個 (<xref:System.Windows.UIPropertyMetadata.IsAnimationProhibited%2A>是`true`中繼資料中)，因為名稱本身是重要的目標動畫。

trans-unit.source: Data binding a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> is technically possible, but is an extremely uncommon scenario because a data-bound <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> cannot serve the main intended purpose of the property: to provide an identifier connection point for code-behind.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>是可行，但是極不常見的案例，因為資料繫結<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>無法提供預期的主要用途，屬性的： 若要提供的程式碼後置識別連接點。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property in code, and then registers the name into the newly created <xref:System.Windows.NameScope> by calling <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RegisterName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>屬性中的程式碼，並再註冊到新建立的 名稱<xref:System.Windows.NameScope>藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RegisterName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The technique illustrated here is a requirement for animating with storyboards, because storyboards require targeting by the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>, and cannot be targeted by object reference.
trans-unit.target: 如下圖所示的技巧是使用分鏡腳本，建立動畫的需求，因為分鏡腳本必須由目標<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>，並不能設為目標的物件參考。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is invoked whenever application code or internal processes call <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，每當應用程式碼或內部處理序呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate" /> 時叫用。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Templates are the section of an element's completed visual tree that comes from the Template property of a <xref:System.Windows.Style> that is applied for the element.
trans-unit.target: 範本是項目的已完成的視覺化樹狀結構的 [範本] 屬性是來自區段<xref:System.Windows.Style>，它會套用項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [設定樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> can use this method as a notification for a variety of possible scenarios:
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別的<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />可以使用此方法為通知的各種可能的案例：

trans-unit.source: You can call your own implementation of code that builds the remainder of an element visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫自己的實作會建立項目的視覺化樹狀結構的其餘部分的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You can run code that relies on the visual tree from templates having been applied, such as obtaining references to named elements that came from a template.
trans-unit.target: 您可以執行已套用至範本，例如取得來自範本的具名項目參考的視覺化樹狀結構所依賴的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You can introduce services that only make sense to exist after the visual tree from templates is complete.
trans-unit.target: 您可以引入只對現有範本的視覺化樹狀結構完成後的服務。

trans-unit.source: You can set states and properties of elements within the template that are dependent on other factors.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定狀態和屬性的項目範本內其他因素而定。

trans-unit.source: For instance, property values might only be discoverable by knowing the parent element, or when a specific derived class uses a common template.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，屬性值可能只會探索所知道的父項目，或當特定衍生類別會使用一般的範本。

trans-unit.source: Implementers should always call the base implementation before their own implementation.
trans-unit.target: 實作者應該一律會呼叫基底實作自己的實作之前。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> itself has no default implementation, but intervening classes might.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 本身有沒有預設值可能會實作，而中介的類別。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" /> offers a similar override, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnTemplateChanged(System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate,System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate)" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" /> 提供類似的覆寫， <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnTemplateChanged(System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate,System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate)" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides data about the event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有關事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuClosing" /> routed event reaches this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuClosing" /> 路由事件到達其路由中的這個類別時，便會叫用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method.
trans-unit.target: 萬一中繼類別繼承中的已實作此方法，您仍應該呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是有點像[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 它會提供方法來處理來自衍生類別的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式的比對事件。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases).
trans-unit.target: On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可能已引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式，因此您的實作必須讓事件引數的來源項目帳戶屬性 （和不應嘗試重新引發該事件，在大部分情況下）。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route.
trans-unit.target: 子類別<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>無法選擇此路由上收到事件時呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 一個可能的情況是取用事件的引數，並謹慎地將事件標示為已處理。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening" /> routed event reaches this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening" /> 路由事件到達其路由中的這個類別時，便會叫用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method.
trans-unit.target: 萬一中繼類別繼承中的已實作此方法，您仍應該呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是有點像[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 它會提供方法來處理來自衍生類別的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式的比對事件。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases).
trans-unit.target: On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可能已引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式，因此您的實作必須讓事件引數的來源項目帳戶屬性 （和不應嘗試重新引發該事件，在大部分情況下）。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route.
trans-unit.target: 子類別<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>無法選擇此路由上收到事件時呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 一個可能的情況是取用事件的引數，並謹慎地將事件標示為已處理。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus" /> event reaches this element in its route.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus" /> 事件到達其路由中的這個項目時，便會叫用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Unlike some other On* methods exposed by the base elements, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnGotFocus%2A> does have a default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 不同於在某些其他 * 基底的項目，所公開的方法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnGotFocus%2A>沒有預設實作。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it has an implementation that overrides the null implementation in the next level of base element down, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnGotFocus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，它有實作會關閉，覆寫基底項目的下一個層級中的 null 實作<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnGotFocus%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When invoked, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnGotFocus%2A> sets appropriate focus behavior on this element in cases where the event originated from the current element due to keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 叫用時，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnGotFocus%2A>鍵盤焦點由於目前的項目產生事件的案例中此項目上設定適當的焦點行為。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnGotFocus%2A> handler does not mark the event arguments as handled, even when focus is set to the current element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnGotFocus%2A>處理常式不會將標示為已處理，即使當焦點設定為目前的項目之事件引數。

trans-unit.source: If the event's source was another element in the tree (not the current element), the handler does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件的來源是另一個項目樹狀目錄 （不是目前項目），此處理常式沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method in order to change the default focus behavior on your element, but be aware that changing focus behavior in this way might be better accomplished by not allowing the element to be focusable at all (see <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫此方法，以變更您的項目，則預設焦點行為，但請注意，變更焦點行為，如此一來可能會更好可藉由不允許完全可設定焦點的項目 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: If you intend to mark the event handled in the arguments, you should be aware of consequences on event handling in other parent elements in the element tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想以標記引數中處理事件，您應該注意的其他項目樹狀結構中的父項目中的事件處理的結果。

trans-unit.source: Because this handler acts on an event with a bubbling routing, setting the focus to the current <paramref name="sender" /> per the event arguments may not be appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個處理常式都會具有反昇路由的事件，將焦點設定至目前<paramref name="sender" />每個事件引數，可能不適合。

trans-unit.source: Focus might need to go to either a composite child element or to a parent element, depending on the compositing of certain controls.
trans-unit.target: 焦點可能需要前往複合式子元素或父項目，根據某些控制項的組合。

trans-unit.source: Therefore marking a focus event as handled is only recommended if the entirety of the visual tree that the event is routing through is part of compositing of a control that you authored.
trans-unit.target: 只建議為已處理，因此標示焦點事件，事件會透過路由傳送的視覺化樹狀結構的全部內容是否撰寫您撰寫的控制項的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized" /> is set to <see langword="true" /> internally.
trans-unit.target: 每當 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized" /> 在內部設為 <see langword="true" /> 便會叫用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This particular On* method is not a class handler hook.
trans-unit.target: 在此特定 * 方法不是類別處理常式攔截。

trans-unit.source: Nor does it exactly follow the established [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] On* method convention that the matching event could be suppressed by overriding this method and not calling the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 或其不完全遵循建立[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上 * 方法慣例相符的事件可能會隱藏所覆寫這個方法，並且不會呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A> property is read-only, so you cannot set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A> to force initialization behavior.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A>屬性是唯讀的因此您不能設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A>來強制初始化行為。

trans-unit.source: Setting the initialization state is intended to be done only by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework.
trans-unit.target: 設定初始設定狀態是只藉由完成[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]架構。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this virtual method raises the event as described above.
trans-unit.target: 此虛擬方法的預設實作會引發事件，如先前所述。

trans-unit.source: Overrides should call the base implementation to preserve this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫應呼叫基底實作以保留此行為。

trans-unit.source: If you fail to call the base implementation, not only will you not raise the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized" /> event as is generally expected of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> derived class, but you will also suppress two important style and theme style initialization operations that are implemented by this base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您無法呼叫基底實作，不只將您不會引發<see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized" />事件，如通常預期的<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />衍生的類別，但您也會隱藏兩個重要樣式和佈景主題樣式初始化作業實作這個基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料，描述已變更的屬性，以及舊值和新值。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 每當 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 上任何相依性屬性的有效值已更新時叫用。

trans-unit.source: The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the arguments parameter.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的特定相依性屬性會在引數參數中報告。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged(System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged(System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to generally detect property changes or invalidations.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是偵測一般的屬性變更或失效。

trans-unit.source: It is instead intended for modifications of the general invalidation pattern if certain information is known about wide classifications of properties.
trans-unit.target: 它改為僅供修改的一般失效模式如果已知廣泛分類屬性的特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method is potentially invoked many times during the life of an object.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會叫用方法多次物件的存留期間。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you can achieve better performance if you override the metadata of specific properties and then attach <xref:System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback> or <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> functions for individual properties.
trans-unit.target: 因此，達到更佳的效能，如果您覆寫特定屬性的中繼資料，然後將附加<xref:System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback>或<xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback>個別屬性的函式。

trans-unit.source: However, you would use this method if a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> includes a significant number of value-interrelated dependency properties, or if it includes logic such as rendering behavior that must be rerun for several related cases of property invalidations.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您會使用這個方法如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>包含大量的值相互關聯的相依性屬性，或如果它包含邏輯，例如轉譯行為，必須重新執行的幾個相關的屬性失效的情況。

trans-unit.source: Note that there is an identically named `OnPropertyChanged` method with a different signature (the parameter type is <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>) that can appear on a number of classes.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，相同具名`OnPropertyChanged`方法具有不同簽章 (參數類型是<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>) 可以出現在數個類別。

trans-unit.source: That `OnPropertyChanged` is used for data object notifications, and is part of the contract for <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 確認`OnPropertyChanged`用於資料物件通知，而且是合約的一部分<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>。

trans-unit.source: Always call the base implementation, as the first operation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 請務必呼叫基底實作，在實作中的第一個作業。

trans-unit.source: Failure to do this will significantly disable the entire [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system, which causes incorrect values to be reported.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這樣做將會大幅停用整個[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]屬性系統，這會導致不正確地回報的值。

trans-unit.source: The specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> implementation is also responsible for maintaining proper state for a variety of properties that affect the visible user interface.
trans-unit.target: 特定<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />實作也會負責維護適當狀態的各種會影響可見的使用者介面的屬性。

trans-unit.source: These include invalidating the visual tree based on changes to style at appropriate times.
trans-unit.target: 這些包括失效的視覺化樹狀結構，根據在適當時間樣式的變更。

trans-unit.source: Details of the old and new size involved in the change.
trans-unit.target: 變更所涉及之舊和新大小的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged" /> event, using the specified information as part of the eventual event data.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的資訊做為最終的事件資料的一部分，引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method you will reset the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> property, or both, depending on what is specified as changed in the supplied arguments, and will you always raise the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫這個方法則會重設<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>屬性，或兩者，根據指定為提供的引數中的變更，並且您總是會引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: Do not override this method for typical layout scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 不要覆寫這個方法的一般配置案例。

trans-unit.source: The layout system operates in a deliberately asynchronous way to assure that all possible layout arrange and measure cases are accounted for.
trans-unit.target: 版面配置系統運作刻意非同步的方式，以確保所有的可能配置排列，和量值的情況下都計算在內。

trans-unit.source: The layout system override methods <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> are usually sufficient for any required layout customization.
trans-unit.target: 版面配置系統覆寫方法<see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)" />和<see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" />通常就足夠了任何必要的配置可自訂的。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnRenderSizeChanged(System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo)" /> is exposed as a virtual.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnRenderSizeChanged(System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo)" /> 會公開為虛擬機器。

trans-unit.source: You can override <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnRenderSizeChanged(System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo)" /> to correct for exceptional cases where a run-time behavioral change related to input events combined with control recomposition in response might give inaccurate layout information.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnRenderSizeChanged(System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo)" />更正的執行階段行為的變更與輸入結合控制項事件的例外狀況的重新編輯畫在回應中的可能會提供不正確的配置資訊。

trans-unit.source: You may still override this method in derived classes (it is protected but not sealed).
trans-unit.target: 您仍可能會覆寫這個方法 （其受到保護但未密封） 衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: Always call the base implementation to preserve the behavior mentioned above, unless you have very specific reasons for disabling default WPF framework-level rendering behavior.
trans-unit.target: 請務必呼叫基底實作，以保留上面所提的行為，除非您有非常特定的理由要停用預設 WPF 架構層級的轉譯行為。

trans-unit.source: Failing to raise the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged" /> event will cause non-standard layout behavior if using the standard WPF framework-level layout system implementation.
trans-unit.target: 無法引發<see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged" />事件會導致非標準的版面配置的行為，如果使用標準的 WPF 架構層級版面配置系統實作。

trans-unit.source: The old style.
trans-unit.target: 舊樣式。

trans-unit.source: The new style.
trans-unit.target: 新樣式。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the style in use on this element changes, which will invalidate the layout.
trans-unit.target: 在這個項目上使用的樣式變更時叫用，如此將使配置失效。

trans-unit.source: This method has a default implementation that sets an internal flag that notes the style changed condition.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已設定的樣式變更條件內部旗標的預設實作。

trans-unit.source: You should not typically have to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 您應該通常不會有覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Any change to a style that involves a measure or arrange change would already trigger another render cycle, assuming a typical implementation of <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> / <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)" />, or the defaults.
trans-unit.target: 任何變更，包括量值為樣式或排列變更已經會觸發另一個轉譯循環，假設典型實作<see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> / <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)" />，或預設值。

trans-unit.source: Overrides of <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnStyleChanged(System.Windows.Style,System.Windows.Style)" /> might be appropriate if your <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> / <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> implementations were deliberately optimizing or supporting partial updates, but still wanted to apply changes to styles more directly.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫的<see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnStyleChanged(System.Windows.Style,System.Windows.Style)" />可能適合如果您<see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> / <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)" />實作刻意的最佳化或支援部分更新，但仍想要更直接套用樣式的變更。

trans-unit.source: (The partial updates would be an attempt to avoid multiple incremental calls to <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure(System.Windows.Size)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange(System.Windows.Rect)" /> on any child elements).
trans-unit.target: (部分的更新會嘗試避免多次累加呼叫<see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure(System.Windows.Size)" />和<see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange(System.Windows.Rect)" />上任何子項目)。

trans-unit.source: Provides data about the event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有關事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing" /> routed event reaches this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing" /> 路由事件到達其路由中的這個類別時，便會叫用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method.
trans-unit.target: 萬一中繼類別繼承中的已實作此方法，您仍應該呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是有點像[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 它會提供方法來處理來自衍生類別的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式的比對事件。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases).
trans-unit.target: On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可能已引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式，因此您的實作必須讓事件引數的來源項目帳戶屬性 （和不應嘗試重新引發該事件，在大部分情況下）。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route.
trans-unit.target: 子類別<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>無法選擇此路由上收到事件時呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 一個可能的情況是取用事件的引數，並謹慎地將事件標示為已處理。

trans-unit.source: Provides data about the event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有關事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening" /> routed event reaches this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening" /> 路由事件到達其路由中的這個類別時，便會叫用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method.
trans-unit.target: 萬一中繼類別繼承中的已實作此方法，您仍應該呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是有點像[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 它會提供方法來處理來自衍生類別的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式的比對事件。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases).
trans-unit.target: On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可能已引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式，因此您的實作必須讓事件引數的來源項目帳戶屬性 （和不應嘗試重新引發該事件，在大部分情況下）。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route.
trans-unit.target: 子類別<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>無法選擇此路由上收到事件時呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.
trans-unit.target: 一個可能的情況是取用事件的引數，並謹慎地將事件標示為已處理，以縮短路由。

trans-unit.source: The old parent element.
trans-unit.target: 舊的父項目。

trans-unit.source: May be <see langword="null" /> to indicate that the element did not have a visual parent previously.
trans-unit.target: 可能為 <see langword="null" />，表示該項目先前沒有一個視覺化父代。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the parent of this element in the visual tree is changed.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化樹狀中這個項目的父項目變更時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.OnVisualParentChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.OnVisualParentChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />。

trans-unit.source: The visual tree is potentially different from the logical tree because it omits elements that do not render visually, such as collections, and expands some elements on the basis of their theme and style compositing.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化樹狀結構是不同的邏輯樹狀結構，因為後者省略集合，例如不以視覺化的方式，呈現的項目，並展開根據其佈景主題和樣式複合 （compositing） 的某些項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [WPF 中的樹狀結構](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this virtual method queries for the new parent, raises various initialization events, and sets internal flags about initialization state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 此虛擬方法的預設實作會查詢以取得新的父項、 引發各種初始化事件，並初始化狀態的相關設定內部的旗標<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />依適當情況。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it calls the successive base implementations as declared by <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />, which in turn calls its base in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />.
trans-unit.target: 最後，它會呼叫後續的基底實作，做為宣告由<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />，接著呼叫其基底<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />。

trans-unit.source: Always call the base implementation to preserve this behavior, otherwise the element tree behavior for this element when declared as a child of another element may not be as expected.
trans-unit.target: 請務必呼叫基底實作以保留此行為，否則為項目樹狀結構行為，這個項目宣告為另一個項目子系時可能無法如預期般。

trans-unit.source: A few existing [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] classes override this method, for example: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Window.OnVisualParentChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.OnVisualParentChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: 一些現有[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]類別覆寫這個方法，例如： <see cref="M:System.Windows.Window.OnVisualParentChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />， <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.OnVisualParentChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />。

trans-unit.source: The most common scenario is to enforce that the new parent must be a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 最常見的案例是新的父系必須是特定類型的強制執行。

trans-unit.source: This might involve throwing an exception if the new parent failed some manner of type test.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會擲回例外狀況，如果新的父項失敗的型別測試的方式。

trans-unit.source: A specialized version of this scenario exists in implementations for list items and menu items, which do not make any sense outside a parent visual that owns an appropriate collection to store them in.
trans-unit.target: 此案例中的特定的版本存在於清單項目和功能表項目，其中沒有意義的任何外部的父 visual 擁有適當的集合，來儲存它們中的實作。

trans-unit.source: Note that these cases do not necessarily raise exceptions, because there might be designer scenarios that rely on reparenting elements that are momentarily without their "regular" parents.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這種情況下不一定會引發例外狀況，因為可能需要重設父代會對不其 「 一般 」 父系的元素的設計工具案例。

trans-unit.source: This method is also overridden in certain elements that are typically the root element, such as <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />.
trans-unit.target: 也在某些項目，通常是根項目，例如覆寫這個方法<see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />。

trans-unit.source: Another case is elements that are the apparent root element in markup but which autogenerate a greater infrastructure in a compiled logical tree (such as <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Page" />).
trans-unit.target: 另一種情況是明顯的根目錄中的項目標記，但其中的項目自動產生已編譯的邏輯樹狀結構中的大於基礎結構 (例如<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Page" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Page" /> implementations deliberately seal the method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />和<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Page" />實作刻意密封方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this element incorporates style properties from theme styles.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此元素的樣式屬性是否來自佈景主題樣式的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element does not use theme style properties; all style-originating properties come from local application styles, and theme style properties do not apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目不會使用佈景主題樣式，所有從樣式產生的屬性都來自本機應用程式樣式，且佈景主題樣式屬性不會套用，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if application styles apply first, and then theme styles apply for properties that were not specifically set in application styles.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式樣式先套用，然後針對不是在應用程式樣式中具體設定的屬性套用佈景主題樣式則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The most common usage of this property is an indirect usage within the setter of a style that is supplying a themed style.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的最常見的用法是提供佈景主題樣式的樣式 setter 內間接使用。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OverridesDefaultStyle%2A> to `true` on a control, you will be suppressing the default control template supplied by the theme styles.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OverridesDefaultStyle%2A>至`true`控制，您將會隱藏佈景主題樣式所提供的預設控制項範本。

trans-unit.source: That control template typically includes the content presenter and other composited elements that provide basic [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] functionality and visualization for the control.
trans-unit.target: 該控制項範本通常包含內容展示器和其他複合項目可提供基本[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]功能和控制項的視覺效果。

trans-unit.source: If you want the control to continue to support the same features as the default theme styles, you must supply an alternate style with a control template that replicates the same structure.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要繼續支援相同的功能，做為預設佈景主題樣式的控制項，您必須提供具有複寫相同的結構的控制項範本的其他樣式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Control Authoring Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[控制項撰寫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OverridesDefaultStyle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OverridesDefaultStyle" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the logical parent element of this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個項目的邏輯父項目。

trans-unit.source: This element's logical parent.
trans-unit.target: 此項目的邏輯父代。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> may be `null` in cases where an element was instantiated, but is not attached to any logical tree that eventually connects to the page level root element, or the application object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> 可能是`null`項目未具現化，但未連接至任何最後會連接到頁面層級的根項目或應用程式物件的邏輯樹狀結構中。

trans-unit.source: Note that the logical parent of an element can potentially change depending on your application's functionality, and keeping the value of this property will not reflect that change.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，根據您的應用程式功能，有可能變更邏輯父項目，可以保留此屬性的值不會反映該變更。

trans-unit.source: You typically should get the value immediately before you need it.
trans-unit.target: 您通常應該取得的值之前您需要它。

trans-unit.source: See [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md) for more information about logical tree traversal, and the scenarios where using <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> as a technique of parent element discovery is appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[中 WPF 樹狀架構](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)邏輯樹狀目錄中周遊的詳細資訊和案例使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A>適當探索是做為父項目的一個技巧。

trans-unit.source: The property engine will potentially recalculate all property values of an element when it is reparented, because some properties inherit values through the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 屬性引擎有可能重新計算所有的屬性值的項目時，它會重設父代，因為有些屬性是繼承的處理邏輯樹狀結構的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> that applies for bindings can also change when elements are reparented.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>可套用的項目會重設父代時，也可以變更繫結。

trans-unit.source: Changing an element's parent is typically only done through manipulation of collections, by using dedicated add or remove methods, or through setting content properties of elements.
trans-unit.target: 變更項目的父代通常只是透過操作的集合，使用專用新增或移除方法，或透過設定內容屬性的項目。

trans-unit.source: The most typical scenario for using the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> property is to obtain a reference and then get various <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> property values from the parent.
trans-unit.target: 最常見的案例使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A>屬性是要取得的參考，然後以取得各種<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>屬性值從父代。

trans-unit.source: For templates, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> of the template eventually will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 範本，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A>範本的最終會`null`。

trans-unit.source: To get past this point and extend into the logical tree where the template is actually applied, use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得略過此點，並將延伸至邏輯樹狀結構實際套用的範本，請使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property does not report visual tree parents in cases where these vary from the logical tree parents.
trans-unit.target: 請注意這個屬性不會報告在這些項從邏輯樹狀結構父項中的視覺化樹狀結構父代。

trans-unit.source: Visual tree parents are not typically important for general application cases but may be the desired parent elements for certain visual level cases.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化樹狀結構的父代不是一般的應用程式案例通常會特別重要，但可能某些視覺層級的情況下所需的父項目。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows code that checks for an element's parent, and then uses property values from the parent to set properties on the child element to match.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例程式碼會檢查有項目的父代，，然後使用從父代的屬性值在比對的子元素設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this case these are properties that affect the rendering size.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，這些是會影響呈現大小屬性。

trans-unit.source: The child element reporting the change.
trans-unit.target: 報告變更的子項目。

trans-unit.source: Supports incremental layout implementations in specialized subclasses of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 的特定子類別 (Subclass) 中支援累加配置實作。
