trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ParentLayoutInvalidated(System.Windows.UIElement)" /> is invoked when a child element has invalidated a property that is marked in metadata as affecting the parent's measure or arrange passes during layout.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ParentLayoutInvalidated(System.Windows.UIElement)" /> 會在子項目使得屬性失效時叫用，該屬性在中繼資料內已標記，會在配置期間影響父代的測量或排列傳遞。

trans-unit.source: If this element has a child element on which some property was invalidated and the property was marked as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentMeasure%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentArrange%2A> in property metadata during registration, this method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目具有子項目所在某些屬性無效的而且屬性被標示為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentMeasure%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentArrange%2A>屬性中繼資料，在註冊期間，會叫用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The method invocation notifies the parent element which particular child element must be re-measured if this element supports partial (incremental) update of layout.
trans-unit.target: 方法引動過程會告知哪個特定子項目必須重新測量，如果此項目支援的配置部分 （累加） 更新的父項目。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> does not support incremental layout, and in the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> class this method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>不支援累加配置，然後在<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>類別，這個方法有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: The scenario where overriding this method would be necessary is not common, because it requires you to modify the default layout system behavior.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，可能需要的案例不常見，因為它會要求您修改預設版面配置系統行為。

trans-unit.source: An example implementation scenario might be if a class had type limitations for possible child elements that are significantly more restrictive than the WPF framework-level layout system.
trans-unit.target: 範例實作的狀況可能是如果類別具有明顯比 WPF 架構層級配置系統更嚴格的可能的子元素的類型限制。

trans-unit.source: Because of the nature of these custom elements, property changes could be deliberately deferred when you implement some custom layout behavior.
trans-unit.target: 基於這些自訂項目本質，屬性變更可能會刻意延後當您實作某些自訂版面配置的行為。

trans-unit.source: For instance, measure/arrange method overrides, which try to optimize the child element render pass, could be deferred for certain types of changes that would ordinarily result in another layout pass.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，測量/排列方法覆寫，嘗試最佳化子項目的呈現階段，可能會延後某些類型的變更通常會導致另一個配置傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The direction for which a prospective focus change should be determined.
trans-unit.target: 應用於決定預期焦點變更的方向。

trans-unit.source: Determines the next element that would receive focus relative to this element for a provided focus movement direction, but does not actually move the focus.
trans-unit.target: 決定下一個項目，該項目會針對所提供的焦點移動方向，接收相對於此項目的焦點，但是不會實際移動焦點。

trans-unit.source: The next element that focus would move to if focus were actually traversed.
trans-unit.target: 如果焦點實際上有周遊時，焦點會移動到的下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: May return <see langword="null" /> if focus cannot be moved relative to this element for the provided direction.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法依所提供的方向相對於此項目移動焦點，則可能傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> is the related method that actually does move focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> 是實際移動焦點的相關的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a handler that handles several possible button inputs, each button representing a possible <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會實作處理數個可能的按鈕輸入，每個按鈕，表示可能的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>。

trans-unit.source: The handler tracks the element with current keyboard focus, and calls <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.PredictFocus%2A> on that element, and specifies the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection> as initialization for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest> type parameter provided.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式會追蹤目前的鍵盤焦點，並呼叫的項目<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.PredictFocus%2A>該項目上，並指定適當<xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>初始化為<xref:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest>型別參數提供。

trans-unit.source: Instead of moving to that element as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> would do, the handler changes the physical dimensions of the predicted focus destination for visualization purposes.
trans-unit.target: 而不需要移動的項目，做為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A>一樣，此處理常式變更視覺效果用途的預測的焦點目的地實體的維度。

trans-unit.source: Specified one of the following directions in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest" />: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Next" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Previous" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.First" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Last" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest" /> 中指定下列其中一個方向：<see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Next" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Previous" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.First" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Last" />。

trans-unit.source: These directions are not legal for <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.PredictFocus(System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection)" /> (but they are legal for <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus(System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest)" />).
trans-unit.target: 這些方向對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.PredictFocus(System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection)" /> 而言不是合法的 (但對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus(System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest)" /> 而言是合法的)。

trans-unit.source: Name to use for the specified name-object mapping.
trans-unit.target: 要用於指定之「名稱-物件」對應的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Object for the mapping.
trans-unit.target: 對應的物件。

trans-unit.source: Provides an accessor that simplifies access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.NameScope" /> registration method.
trans-unit.target: 提供可簡化對 <see cref="T:System.Windows.NameScope" /> 註冊方法之存取的存取子 (Accessor)。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenience method for calling <xref:System.Windows.NameScope.RegisterName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是便利的方法用於呼叫<xref:System.Windows.NameScope.RegisterName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The implementation will check successive parent elements until it finds the applicable <xref:System.Windows.NameScope> implementation, which is found by finding an element that implements <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>.
trans-unit.target: 實作會檢查後續的父項目，直到找到適用<xref:System.Windows.NameScope>實作，其位於藉由尋找可實作項目<xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about namescopes, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需命名範圍的詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RegisterName%2A> is necessary in order to correctly hook up animation storyboards for applications when created in code.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RegisterName%2A>會需要正確的應用程式程式碼中建立時的動畫分鏡腳本連結。

trans-unit.source: This is because one of the key storyboard properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName%2A>, uses a run-time name lookup instead of being able to take a reference to a target element.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為其中一個索引鍵的分鏡腳本屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName%2A>，會使用執行階段名稱查詢，而不是能夠充分目標項目的參考。

trans-unit.source: This is true even if that element is accessible by reference from the code.
trans-unit.target: 即使該元素是可供參考從程式碼存取，也是如此。

trans-unit.source: For more information on why you need to register names for storyboard targets, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關為什麼您需要註冊的分鏡腳本目標名稱的詳細資訊，請參閱[概觀腳本](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The element to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的項目。

trans-unit.source: Removes the provided object from this element's logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 從這個項目的邏輯樹狀中移除提供的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> updates the affected logical tree parent pointers to keep in sync with this deletion.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 會更新受到影響的邏輯樹狀結構父系指標，以保持與此項刪除動作的同步。

trans-unit.source: Use this method for the implementation of collections on objects that represent logical children of an element.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法實作的邏輯子系的項目表示物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This might be done in property getters or setters, class handlers of `Changed` events, constructors, or within the collection types themselves.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是屬性 getter 或 setter，類別處理常式的`Changed`事件、 建構函式，或集合內的類型本身。

trans-unit.source: For control authors, manipulating the logical tree at this level is not the recommended practice, unless none of the provided base control class' content models are appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的作者，處理邏輯樹狀結構，此層級不建議的作法，除非是提供基底控制項類別的內容模型沒有適合。

trans-unit.source: Consider subclassing at the level of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮在層級的子類別化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: These classes provide a content model with particular enforcement of logical children through dedicated [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)], as well as support for other features typically desirable in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] control such as styling through templates.
trans-unit.target: 這些類別會提供透過專用的邏輯子系的特定增強的內容模型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]，以及通常希望出現在其他功能的支援[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]控制項，例如透過範本的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a `Child` property on a custom <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that does its own visual layer implementation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會實作`Child`在自訂屬性<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>執行它自己的視覺層實作。

trans-unit.source: The property's setter is designed so that if the value changes, the old value is removed from the logical tree, as well as a class-specific visual collection.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 setter 的設計，因此如果的值變更時，會從邏輯樹狀結構，以及類別的特定視覺集合移除的舊值。

trans-unit.source: The values are cached, and then the new value is added to both the standard WPF framework level logical tree and the custom visual collection.
trans-unit.target: 會快取的值，並接著新值加入至標準 WPF 架構層級邏輯樹狀結構和自訂的視覺集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView(System.Windows.Rect)" /> is called on this element.
trans-unit.target: 在這個項目上呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView(System.Windows.Rect)" /> 時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates to a parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> (or derived class) that the element that raises the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> event should be made visible within the scrollable region.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件表示至父代<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>（或衍生類別） 所引發的項目<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>事件應該會顯示可捲動區域內。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will then mark the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> event as handled, by using class handling of the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>然後會將標示<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>為已處理，使用類別處理事件的事件。

trans-unit.source: In general <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> event data should not be marked handled by any class that does control a scrolling region, or by any instance handler, because doing so would interfere with the intended goal of the element that called <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>事件資料應該不會標示為已處理的任何類別，並控制捲動區域，或任何執行個體處理常式，因為這樣會干擾呼叫的項目，目的是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: 反昇

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the locally-defined resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在本機定義的資源字典。

trans-unit.source: The current locally-defined dictionary of resources, where each resource can be accessed by key.
trans-unit.target: 目前在本機定義的資源字典，其中每項資源都可以使用索引鍵存取。

trans-unit.source: Resource dictionaries that can be defined completely or partially in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] are typically created as a property element, and are typically on the root element for any individual page or for the application.
trans-unit.target: 可以完全或部分中定義的資源字典[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通常會建立為屬性項目，且通常是針對任何個別頁面或應用程式的根項目。

trans-unit.source: Placing the resource dictionary at this level makes it easier to find from individual child elements in the page (or from any page, in the application case).
trans-unit.target: 放置在此層級的資源字典，可以更輕鬆地尋找個別的子系中的項目頁面 （或從任何頁面上，在應用程式的情況下）。

trans-unit.source: In most application scenarios, we recommend that styles be defined as object elements within a resource dictionary, or be defined as external resources so that the entire style resource can be self-contained (this approach helps separate designer responsibilities from developer responsibilities by separating the physical files that need to be edited).
trans-unit.target: 在大部分的應用程式案例中，我們建議樣式定義做為物件項目內的資源字典，或定義為外部資源，以便可以是獨立的整個樣式資源 （這種方式有助於個別設計工具責任從開發人員責任分隔需要加以編輯的實體檔案）。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property returns only the resource dictionary declared directly within that element.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個屬性會傳回直接在該元素中宣告的資源字典。

trans-unit.source: This is different than the actual resource lookup process, where a child element can access any of the resources defined in each parent element, searching recursively upwards.
trans-unit.target: 這是不同於實際資源對應程序，其中的子元素可以存取任何遞迴地向上搜尋每個父項目中所定義的資源。

trans-unit.source: Resources can also be referenced by code from within the collection, but be aware that resources created in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will definitely not be accessible until after <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> is raised by the element that declares the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 資源也可以從集合中的程式碼所參考，但請注意在中建立資源[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]絕對不會之前之後存取<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>宣告字典的項目就會引發。

trans-unit.source: In fact, resources are parsed asynchronously and not even the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> event is an assurance that you can reference a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] defined resource.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式並不會剖析資源的事實上，即使<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>事件可確保您可以參考[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]定義資源。

trans-unit.source: For this reason you should generally only access [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] defined resources as part of run-time code, or through other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] techniques such as styles or resource extension references for attribute values.
trans-unit.target: 因此您應該通常只存取[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]資源定義為一部分的執行階段程式碼，或透過其他[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]技術，例如樣式或屬性值的資源擴充功能參考。

trans-unit.source: When you access resources through code, it is essentially equivalent to a reference made from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 當您透過程式碼存取資源時，它是基本上等同於從進行參考[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> supports the methods required to add, remove or query resources from within the collection by using code.
trans-unit.target: 基礎<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>支援加入、 移除或使用程式碼來查詢集合中的資源所需的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources%2A> property is settable to support the scenario of completely replacing the resources collection of an element to be a new or different <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources%2A>屬性是可設定為支援完全取代項目是一個新的或不同的資源集合的案例<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax shown does not include an element for the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]所示的語法不包括的項目<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: This is an example of implicit collection syntax; a tag representing the collection element can be omitted.
trans-unit.target: 這是隱含的集合語法; 的範例可以省略標記，表示集合項目。

trans-unit.source: The elements that are added as items to the collection are specified instead.
trans-unit.target: 會改為指定做為項目加入至集合的項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about implicit collections and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關隱含的集合和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，請參閱[XAML 語法的詳細資料](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。

trans-unit.source: One case where a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> is still specified explicitly as an element is if you are introducing a merged dictionary, in which case there are typically no child elements for that <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個案例其中<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>還是明確地指定為項目就是引進的一個合併的字典，在此情況下是否有通常該任何子項目<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[合併資源字典](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreResourceElements*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreResourceElements*

trans-unit.source: One or more object elements, each of which defines a resource.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個物件項目，其中每個定義的資源。

trans-unit.source: Each resource property element within each <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> must have a unique value for the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md), which serves as the unique key when values are retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 每個資源屬性的項目在每個<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>值必須是唯一的[X:key 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)，從擷取值時做為唯一索引鍵<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Attaches a binding to this element for the specified dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 將繫結附加至指定相依性屬性的這個項目。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the destination property where the binding should be established.
trans-unit.target: 識別要建立繫結的目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The source property name or the path to the property used for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 用於繫結之屬性的來源屬性名稱或路徑。

trans-unit.source: Attaches a binding to this element, based on the provided source property name as a path qualification to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 根據提供給資料來源做為路徑限定性條件的來源屬性名稱，將繫結附加至這個項目。

trans-unit.source: Records the conditions of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 記錄繫結的條件。

trans-unit.source: This return value can be useful for error checking.
trans-unit.target: 這個傳回值對錯誤檢查很有用。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenience method for calling <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.SetBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which passes the current instance as the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>, and creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> based on the provided `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是便利的方法用於呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.SetBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，然後傳遞做為目前的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>，並建立新<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>依據提供`path`參數。

trans-unit.source: This signature is more convenient if you are establishing a simple default binding.
trans-unit.target: 此簽章是更方便，如果您要建立簡單的預設繫結。

trans-unit.source: If you need to specify any binding properties to non-default conditions, or want to use a <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>,you should use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SetBinding%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Data.BindingBase%29> signature.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要指定非預設的條件，任何繫結屬性，或想要使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>，您應該使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SetBinding%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Data.BindingBase%29>簽章。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets a binding using a specific path.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定使用特定路徑的繫結。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property where the binding should be established.
trans-unit.target: 識別應該要建立繫結的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Represents the specifics of the data binding.
trans-unit.target: 代表資料繫結的詳細規格。

trans-unit.source: Attaches a binding to this element, based on the provided binding object.
trans-unit.target: 根據提供的繫結物件，將繫結附加至這個項目。

trans-unit.source: Records the conditions of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 記錄繫結的條件。

trans-unit.source: This return value can be useful for error checking.
trans-unit.target: 這個傳回值對錯誤檢查很有用。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenience method for calling <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.SetBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which passes the current instance as the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是便利的方法用於呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.SetBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，然後傳遞做為目前的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>。

trans-unit.source: The element that specifies a flow direction.
trans-unit.target: 指定流程方向的項目。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration, specifying the direction.
trans-unit.target: 指定方向的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> attached property for the provided element.
trans-unit.target: 設定所提供項目的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> 附加屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This method supports attached property syntax for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> property, therefore allowing child elements of a provided <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> to specify flow direction for the arrangement within their parent element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法支援附加的屬性的語法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>屬性，因此允許的提供項目子系<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>以指定的排列方式，其父項目中的資料流程方向。

trans-unit.source: To set the value on the current <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, use the direct [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessor <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在目前設定的值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，使用 direct[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]存取子<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The property to which the resource is bound.
trans-unit.target: 資源繫結到的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 資源名稱。

trans-unit.source: Searches for a resource with the specified name and sets up a resource reference to it for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋具有指定名稱的資源，並針對指定的屬性建立該資源的資源參考。

trans-unit.source: A resource reference is similar to the use of a [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) in markup.
trans-unit.target: 資源參考是可讓您使用類似[DynamicResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)標記中。

trans-unit.source: The resource reference creates an internal expression that supplies the value of the specified property on a run-time deferred basis.
trans-unit.target: 資源參考建立內部的運算式，提供執行階段的延遲為基礎的指定屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The expression will be re-evaluated whenever the resource dictionary indicates a changed value through internal events, or whenever the current element is reparented (a parent change would change the dictionary lookup path).
trans-unit.target: 每次您的資源字典表示變更的值，透過內部事件，或目前的項目重設父代重新評估運算式 （父代變更會變更的字典查閱路徑）。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether serialization processes should serialize the contents of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列化 (Serialization) 處理序是否應該將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources" /> 屬性的內容序列化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources" /> 屬性值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This will return `true` as long as there is at least one keyed resource in the local <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這會傳回`true`，只要至少一個索引鍵的資源正在本機<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether serialization processes should serialize the contents of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列化 (Serialization) 處理序是否應該將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style" /> 屬性的內容序列化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style" /> 屬性值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This will return `true` if the <xref:System.Windows.Style> is locally set.
trans-unit.target: 這會傳回`true`如果<xref:System.Windows.Style>本機設定。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether serialization processes should serialize the contents of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列化 (Serialization) 處理序是否應該將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers" /> 屬性的內容序列化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers" /> 屬性值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` if the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers%2A> property is locally set.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回`true`如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers%2A>屬性在本機設定。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when either the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight" /> or the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth" /> properties change value on this element.
trans-unit.target: 當這個項目的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth" /> 屬性變更值時發生。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do not follow a route, they are only handled within the same element on which they are raised.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件不會遵循路由，才會處理在引發相同的項目內。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do support other routed event behavior: they support an accessible handlers collection, and can be used as an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件並支援其他路由的事件的行為： 它們支援可存取的處理常式集合中，且可用來當作<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>樣式。

trans-unit.source: The layout system reads properties within the <xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedEventArgs> argument class of this event, to determine whether the reported size changes should be considered significant.
trans-unit.target: 版面配置系統會讀取內容內<xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedEventArgs>引數類別，這個事件，以判斷是否應該在報告的大小變更視為重要。

trans-unit.source: This allows the layout system or your control-specific layout implementations to avoid forcing a layout change due to visually imperceptible differences between old and new height or width values.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓版面配置系統或您的特定控制項的版面配置實作來避免強制版面配置變更，因為以視覺化方式無法察覺舊的和新的高度或寬度值之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: The imperceptible differences might be due to rounding or same-result calculations of a floating-point data types.
trans-unit.target: 無法察覺的差異可能是因為浮點資料類型的捨入或相同結果的計算。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Direct
trans-unit.target: 直接

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the source value changes for any existing property binding on this element.
trans-unit.target: 來源值因與此項目繫結的任何現有屬性變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated> event that is raised by any <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated>引發任何事件<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>與這個項目相關聯。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style used by this element when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個項目呈現時要使用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The applied, nondefault style for the element, if present.
trans-unit.target: 如有，則為項目已套用的非預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The default for a default-constructed <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 的預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For controls, the current style is often provided by a default style from control theming, or from styles generally applied to controls of that type by resources at page or application level (an implicit style).
trans-unit.target: 控制項，通常是提供的預設樣式來自控制項主題設定，或樣式通常由套用至該類型的控制項在頁面或應用程式層級 （隱含樣式） 的資源目前的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property does not set or return default (theme) styles, but it does return either an implicit style or an explicit style that is acting on the element.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會設定或傳回預設 （佈景主題） 樣式，但會傳回隱含樣式或項目做為明確樣式。

trans-unit.source: In the case of implicit or explicit styles, it does not matter whether the style is specified as a resource or defined locally.
trans-unit.target: 在隱含或明確樣式的情況下，樣式是指定為資源，或在本機定義並不重要。

trans-unit.source: Setting the styles has some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 設定樣式會有一些限制。

trans-unit.source: You can reset the entire <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Windows.Style> at any time, which will force a layout recomposition.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重設整個<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性至新<xref:System.Windows.Style>在任何時間，這會強制配置重新編輯畫。

trans-unit.source: However, as soon as that style is placed in use by a loaded element, the <xref:System.Windows.Style> should be considered sealed.
trans-unit.target: 不過，一旦該樣式會放在使用中載入的項目，<xref:System.Windows.Style>應該被視為已密封。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to make a change to any individual property of an in-use style (such as anything within the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A>) causes an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試變更的任何個別的使用中樣式屬性 (例如在集合內的任何項目<xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A>)，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A style that is defined in markup is considered to be in use as soon as it is loaded from a resource dictionary (for resources), or the page it is contained within is loaded (for inline styles).
trans-unit.target: 標記中定義的樣式會被視為正在使用中，一旦載入時將它從資源字典 （資源），或載入它包含在的頁面 （適用於內嵌樣式）。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> is a dependency property with special precedence.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> 是具有特殊的優先順序的相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The locally set style generally operates at the highest precedence in the property system.
trans-unit.target: 本機設定樣式通常都是在運作的最高的優先順序屬性系統中。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> is null at this point, during loading the property system checks for implicit styles in local or application resources that specify that type.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>為 null 此時，在載入中指定該類型的本機或應用程式資源的隱含樣式屬性系統檢查期間。

trans-unit.source: If the style is still null after this step, then the acting style for presentation purposes generally comes from the default (theme) style, but the default style is not returned in the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果樣式時仍然是 null，這個步驟之後，將顯示用途的動作樣式通常是來自預設 （佈景主題） 的樣式，但中不會傳回預設樣式<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: See [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md) or [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)或[設定樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要求之環境屬性 (Ambient Property) 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="propertyName" /> is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 可用則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IQueryAmbient> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IQueryAmbient> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an arbitrary object value that can be used to store custom information about this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可以用來儲存關於此元素自訂資訊的任意物件值。

trans-unit.source: The intended value.
trans-unit.target: 所要的值。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: This property is analogous to Tag properties in other Microsoft programming models, such as Visual Basic for Applications or Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性相當於其他 Microsoft 程式撰寫模型，例如 Visual Basic 應用程式或 Windows Form 中的標記屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Tag%2A> is intended to provide a pre-existing property location where you can store some basic custom information about any <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> without requiring you to subclass an element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Tag%2A> 目的為了提供既有的屬性位置，您可以在其中儲存有關任何一些基本的自訂資訊<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>而不需要您子類別化項目。

trans-unit.source: Because this property takes an object, you need to use the property element usage in order to set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Tag%2A> property in XAML to anything other than an object with a known and built-in type converter, such as a string.
trans-unit.target: 因為此屬性會接受物件，您必須使用屬性項目用法才能設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Tag%2A>屬性在 XAML 中具有已知與內建型別轉換子，例如字串的物件以外的任何項目。

trans-unit.source: Objects used in this manner are typically not within the standard WPF namespaces and therefore may require namespace mapping to the external namespace in order to be introduced as XAML elements.
trans-unit.target: 這種方式中使用的物件通常不是在標準 WPF 命名空間內，因此可能也需要命名空間對應至外部命名空間才能引進做為 XAML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md) and [XAML and Custom Classes for WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-and-custom-classes-for-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和 WPF XAML 命名空間對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)和[XAML 和自訂類別 wpf](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-and-custom-classes-for-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Tag" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Tag" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the target value changes for any property binding on this element.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目上的任何屬性繫結的目標值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated> event that is raised by any <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated>引發任何事件<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>與這個項目相關聯。

trans-unit.source: This usually means that the binding in question is a two-way binding, and that the bound dependency property affirms that the previous property value is now invalid according to any validation or caching scheme that the property or the data source support.
trans-unit.target: 這通常表示有問題的繫結是雙向繫結，繫結的相依性屬性 affirms，先前的屬性值無效現在根據任何驗證或快取的屬性或資料來源支援的配置。

trans-unit.source: Use the event data of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TargetUpdated> event to determine the specific property that is reporting the target value update.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件資料的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TargetUpdated>事件，以判定所報告的目標值更新的特定屬性。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the template parent of this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個項目的範本父代參考。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant if the element was not created through a template.
trans-unit.target: 若此項目不是透過範本建立，則這個屬性不相關。

trans-unit.source: The element whose <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.VisualTree" /> caused this element to be created.
trans-unit.target: 項目其<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.VisualTree" />造成要建立這個項目。

trans-unit.source: This value is frequently <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值通常是<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A> is frequently `null` for objects that are created in your application markup or code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A> 通常是`null`會在您的應用程式標記或程式碼中建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: This is because you create those objects directly, not via a template.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為您建立這些物件直接，不會透過範本。

trans-unit.source: Object references obtained by walking the logical tree from the root, or by typical name references, do not come from a template.
trans-unit.target: 物件或一般名稱參考來查核邏輯樹狀結構根目錄中，從取得的參考，不是來自範本。

trans-unit.source: Cases where <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A> might not be `null` include operations such as hit-testing, event handling for certain low-level input events, walking the visual tree with <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper>, or working with enumerators, which might return elements that came from templates.
trans-unit.target: 狀況下<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A>可能`null`包含點擊測試查核視覺化樹狀結構，與特定低階事件輸入的事件處理等作業<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper>，或使用列舉值，這可能會傳回來源的項目從範本。

trans-unit.source: Another case is if you specifically call <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A> against an existing <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate> and are work with the returned object.
trans-unit.target: 另一種情況是如果您特別呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A>針對現有<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate>和會使用傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: Templates are actually shared objects, where the contents of the template are created only once.
trans-unit.target: 範本是範本的內容會一次建立的實際共用的物件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you obtain an object reference to an element that came from a template, you may find that the apparent logical tree does not reach to the page root.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果您取得的項目，以來自範本的物件參考時，您可能會發現明顯的邏輯樹狀結構不會到達頁面根。

trans-unit.source: In order to connect such a template reference to the page's logical tree, you should get the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A> value and continue to navigate that element tree as desired.
trans-unit.target: 若要連接至邏輯樹狀結構頁面的這類的範本參考，您應該取得<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A>值，並繼續瀏覽所需的項目樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tool-tip object that is displayed for this element in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定工具提示物件，該物件會為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中的這個項目而顯示。

trans-unit.source: The tooltip object.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示物件。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>, then that value is the tool-tip that will be used in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>，該值就會用於工具提示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If the value is of any other type, then that value will be used as the *content* for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> provided (constructed) by the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為任何其他型別，則該值會用作*內容*如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>提供 （建構） 系統。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>。

trans-unit.source: The service class provides attached properties that can be used to further customize a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: 服務類別會提供可用來進一步自訂的附加的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *toolTipContent*
trans-unit.target: *toolTipContent*

trans-unit.source: A string that becomes the display text for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 會變成顯示的文字字串<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>。

trans-unit.source: *toolTipObjectContent*
trans-unit.target: *toolTipObjectContent*

trans-unit.source: Some object, provided in object element form, that should be used as the content for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> .
trans-unit.target: 提供物件項目表單，應該做的內容中的某些物件<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>。

trans-unit.source: Typically this would be a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or some other element that creates layout compositing for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>, eventually containing text content within the compositing.
trans-unit.target: 通常這會是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或其他項目所建立的配置複合<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>，最後會包含與撰寫的文字內容。

trans-unit.source: In this usage, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> element is created implicitly from the parsed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], and the *toolTipObjectContent* content is set as its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 在這種用法，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>元素建立隱含從已剖析[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，而*toolTipObjectContent*內容設定為其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <`ToolTip` .../>
trans-unit.target: <`ToolTip` .../>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> in code and then sets the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>中程式碼，然後設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before any tooltip on the element is closed.
trans-unit.target: 在項目上的任何工具提示正要關閉之前發生。

trans-unit.source: Marking the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing> event as handled does not cancel closing the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 標示<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing>為已處理的事件並不會取消關閉工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Once the tooltip is displayed, closing the tooltip is done only in response to user interaction with the UI.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示顯示之後，關閉工具提示會進行只回應使用者互動與 UI。

trans-unit.source: This event cannot be an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不可以是<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>樣式。

trans-unit.source: This is because the identifier field of this event re-uses an implementation from a service that does not expose add/remove event methods for the service-level event.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為此事件的識別項欄位會重複使用來自服務未公開新增/移除服務層級事件的事件方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Direct
trans-unit.target: 直接

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnToolTipClosing%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnToolTipClosing%2A>實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any tooltip on the element is opened.
trans-unit.target: 任何元素的工具提示開啟時發生。

trans-unit.source: To prevent a tooltip from appearing in the UI, your handler for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening> can mark the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipEventArgs> event data handled.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止出現在 UI 中，您的處理常式的工具提示<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening>可以標示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipEventArgs>處理的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the tooltip is displayed, using the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A> property as the tooltip content.
trans-unit.target: 否則，顯示工具提示，使用值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>做為工具提示內容的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Another possible scenario is that you could write a handler that resets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A> property for the element that is the event source, just before the tooltip is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 另一個可能的狀況是您可以撰寫會重設的值的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>針對項目，事件來源，才會顯示工具提示的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening> will not be raised if the value of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A> is `null` or otherwise unset.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening> 系統不會引發如果的值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>是`null`或其他未設定。

trans-unit.source: Do not deliberately set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A> to `null` while a tooltip is open or opening; this will not have the effect of closing the tooltip, and will instead create an undesirable visual artifact in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 不刻意設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>至`null`tooltip 為開啟，或開啟; 這並不會影響關閉工具提示中，且會改為建立在 UI 中讓人困擾的視覺成品時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening> event cannot be an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening>事件不可以是<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>樣式。

trans-unit.source: This is because the identifier field of this event re-uses an implementation from a service that does not expose add/remove event methods for the service-level event.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為此事件的識別項欄位會重複使用來自服務未公開新增/移除服務層級事件的事件方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Direct
trans-unit.target: 直接
